Currently the water level is peaking to overflow capacity and in May it will start receding and that is when the trouble will start.The standing water left behind is prime breeding ground for mosquitoes.  Is such a underdeveloped and populated area as Belen, Malaria and even Dengue Fever (another mosquito born virus) will run rampant.  With your help the children of Belen can be protected during this dangerous time of year and use the net for years to come.
During the Malaria net deliveries I will be using my TV experience to provide donors with LIVE Stream video tours of Belen (Via Facebook) and interview the children we are helping. I will also film the entire process which will be  produced into a video for the donors, and school children to learn more about Malaria, different cultures and societies.   
The funds will be used for Malaria nets, travel expense, and food.  We have many incredible perks for your generosity.  If we do not meet or surpass our goal I will still make that best of what I have and continue fighting to protect children from Malaria. 
It is a simple way to directly save lives.I hope you will please join me on this life saving mission and together we can protect more and more children of the world from Malaria.

Feel free to contact me with any questions or interviews.
Sincerely,Rusty JohnsonRusty@RustyJohnson.tvwww.RustyJohnson.tv845-430-8306

story:
A little more about me:

I am an Austrian living in Guatemala for the past 10 Years. In that time I was able to do small Jobs here and there that kept things going. Its not even compareable to European pay, but it was enough.

My Dad was already living here the past 30 Years and so I guessed it was a good option to see the World. Around 7 Years ago my Dad had then a stroke which left him unable to work and I decided to take care of him here. While my Mom stayed alone in Austria. I begged her to get me home around every Holiday, but she was against it.

Since then working conditions have become difficult to the point that I have been unemployed the past 2 Years and so was unable to do anything about what happend the beginning of this Year.

The reason this is so urgent:

Meanwhile my mother was also taking care of her Brother who has become sick and due to his health state he was now moved to a home in January. These past months I was almost unable to talk to her and I knew things were not going so well. So in the beginning of February she came into the Hospital, because of cancer. I knew then I had to go and tried another Fundraiser that went nowhere. I tried everything I could think of to get enough money together, but it was hopeless. The Ticket from Guatemala to Austria costs around 1000-1200 Dollar. There are sometimes cheaper flights, but at the moment I cant quite wait for a good deal.

This week now my Mother passed away and I am completly destroyed. I wish to get to her Funeral to at least say Goodbye, even if its already too late. I beg of everyone reading this, please help me get there.

What have I done so far to get this done:

I already contacted the Embassy and Foreign Ministry to give me a loan in order to get home, but that was denied. None of my Friends has enough money to get even close to that amount. I have no more Family members left that would be in a position to help me. I also already contacted Emergency Help Centers in Austria, but also to no avail. I am really out of Ideas at this point and my Time is running up. I can only beg again, please somebody help me get to that Funeral!

story:
Our History and Vision

My name is Roger, CEO and co-founder of tip4good. My grandfather started a footwear manufacturing company in our homeland of Nicaragua back in 1956. In spite of revolutions, volcanoes, earthquakes, and hurricanes, our company prospered. We made it a point of pride to pay our workers well, but this sometimes fell short of what they needed, especially in emergencies.

In the past few years, low-cost competition started hurting our business. We ultimately had to close the plant and layoff our employees. Now we will never be able to pay them again, much less raise their wages as we would have liked to.

Losing the factory was a big setback to our family. Reflecting on it, I started looking into what could be done to better the livelihoods of workers while running a business in such a cutthroat industry. What I found was a big surprise! It turns out there’s quite a lot of people all over the world concerned about this. Studies show they are willing to pay more for their shoes and clothes if they can be assured the extra money gets to the workers who made them. But how do you go about doing this?

Our idea grew out of this question, and, by stroke of luck, it just so happened that we went about solving it at precisely the same time that the technologies required to make it feasible were also coming online. This is the genesis of tip4good – a fortuitous intersection of philanthropy and mobile payments technology harnessed to enhance the livelihoods of garment workers.

We need a bold new approach to dealing this critical issue facing the fashion industry:  the 60 million factory workers who cut and stitch our clothes and shoes don’t earn enough income to provide a basic standard of living for themselves and their families. A garment worker is paid just a fraction of a cent per dollar on the retail price of an item. In some countries they take home as little as USD 55 per month!

Most of the 80% of workers who are women are heads of household providing for children and older relatives. No one has found an effective sustainable way to get more income into the hands of these workers.  Funneling additional money down the supply chain by paying more at the cash register simply means it inevitably falls prey to the industry's rational profit-seeking stakeholders (retailers, brands, intermediaries, and suppliers). Expecting brands to coerce their supplier factories into paying their workers more while simultaneously demanding lower prices on their garments is wishful thinking.

 

But now there’s something we can do. If you feel compelled to make a personal impact, there’s no need to wait. tip4good allows you to take matters into your own hands and reach the worker directly. You may now pay her a gratuity to thank her for her awesome craftsmanship or simply because you’re aware that everyone on the team that made your shirt probably isn’t making enough to live a decent life, escape poverty, or have an opportunity to prosper. 

We harness the global proliferation of mobile payments technology to allow you to get more money straight to these workers by generously thanking them with a gratuity. And being fully digital from end to end permits us do this with perfect traceability and transparency. That way we ensure that no funds are misappropriated and every gratuity gets to the workers who made that item.

 

How it Works

A participating brand instructs all its supplier factories to place a tip4good tag on each of its garments. The tags contain a unique QR code that identifies its work order as well as each worker who assembled that batch. Upon purchase, the consumer scans the QR code on the tag with her mobile phone, allowing her to select a gratuity payment as well as download our mobile app and register in our rewards program. The payment is sent to our clearinghouse where it is accumulated on its respective QR code account. Upon meeting a threshold the account is disbursed and paid out directly to digital wallets on the workers’ mobile phones. On all participating brands, users earn points that can be redeemed for all sorts of rewards: discounts, game tokens, event passes, status, etc.    

 

What We Need & What You Get

WE ARE SEEKING – USD 42,100 to fund development of the platform for our ongoing pilot program and relocate the company. Nicaragua, our current base, is undergoing a severe political and economic crisis that has depleted our funding and endangers the viability of our company.

  The use of funds is as follows

  1. Android/iOS app development                               USD   8.000
  2. Website/SSL, interface and dashboard               USD    5.100
  3. Administration/relocation/expenses                   USD 29.000

YOU GET – a chance to take part in a pioneering venture, a great experiment in out-of-the-box thinking, to mitigate one of the fashion industry’s most intractable problems by utilizing technology and capitalizing on deepening consumer trends favoring ethical consumption.

 

The Impact

IMPACT – tip4good is the first mass direct-income transfer framework in history, with a potential to impact millions of people. It could set the precedent for a completely new way of lifting people out of poverty by sheer force of generosity and in so doing help reduce the incidence of wars, terrorism, forced migrations, human suffering, and environmental degradation—a boon for humanity.

The impact on women’s empowerment could be especially significant as they comprise the vast majority of garment workers and most of them support entire families. The effect of optimized spending of enhanced income is amplified in these circumstances, as the household benefits disproportionately from additional spending on education, nutrition, childcare, healthcare, savings, and investment. The implications of being able to do something as mundane as simply giving families in the developing world a little more income could be nothing short of profound for mankind if this idea functions at scale. And there is no greater scale than that provided by an industry that literally touches every last human being on the planet: fashion.

If there be a noble experiment, this one shines.

What do people think?

 

Risks & Challenges

tip4good is a win-win-win-win proposition. No stakeholder has anything to lose by seeing it flourish. Consumers gain additional gratification from indulging their generosity while making a purchase. Retailers and fashion brands gain a turnkey corporate social responsibility initiative they need not administer, as well as burnished ethical credentials that are progressively rewarded by segments with growing purchasing power such Millenials and sustainably oriented consumers. Brands may even have access to our digital platform to monitor gratuity funds they generate in real time, harvesting valuable consumer data and verifying performance. Factories gain a tool for improving employee morale, minimizing turnover, and reducing costs. And, last but not least, the additional income for workers can provide a pathway out of poverty for themselves and coming generations. Entire nations could witness a new age of increased prosperity unleashed by the effects of additional income harnessed to fuel drivers of growth such as education, healthcare, and investment.

story:
We need your help to take the LGBTI Pride Ecuador to GALAPAGOS 

Necesitamos tu ayuda para llevar el Orgullo LGBTI Ecuador a GALÁPAGOS 

 

We believe that it is very important to provide citizens with a space to approach and demystify and eradicate stereotypes around our sexuality, so this year the central theme of the LGBTI Pride Days of 2018 will revolve around the idea that the defense of The rights of LGBTI populations are not inconsequential, trivial or even insignificant. The populations of lesbian, gay, bisexual, trans and intersex in the Galapagos Islands form an important population group, both numerically and for the contributions made to society through the questioning of the sexist and patriarchal values ​​that have characterized the construction of the identity of the Western man. This theme invites us to reflect on the gaps and inequities between the population in general and LGBTI populations, while demanding equality before the law and the law.

 

Consideramos que es muy importante brindar a la ciudadanía un espacio de acercamiento que permite desmitificar y erradicar los estereotipos alrededor de nuestra sexualidad, por tanto este año el tema central de las Jornadas del Orgullo LGBTI de 2018 girará alrededor de la idea de que la defensa de los derechos de las poblaciones LGBTI no es intrascendente, ni trivial o peor insignificante. Las poblaciones de lesbianas, gays, bisexuales, trans e intersex en las Islas Galápagos forman un importante conjunto poblacional, tanto numéricamente como por los aportes hechos a la sociedad mediante el cuestionamiento de los valores sexistas y patriarcales que han caracterizado la construcción de la identidad del hombre occidental.   Esta temática nos invita a la reflexión en torno a las brechas e inequidades entre la población en general y las poblaciones LGBTI, al tiempo que exige igualdad ante la ley y el derecho.

General purpose:

To make the LGBTI community in the Galapagos Islands visible, to present their problems and their complex universe, to contribute to the process of integration and connection with society, promoting the creation of public policies in the cultural, social, educational and economic fields.

Objetivo general:

Visibilizar a la comunidad LGBTI en las Islas Galápagos, presentar su problemática y su complejo universo, para aportar al proceso de integración y vinculación con la sociedad, promoviendo la creación de políticas públicas en lo cultural, social, educativas y económicas.

Specific purposes:

1.- Promote the visibility and participation of GLBTI populations in the Galapagos Islands through socio-cultural acts of socialization and integration.

2.- Establish several spaces for citizens to have the opportunity to learn more about the GLBTI community, its culture, its rights and new conquests, taking as a frame of reference the Constitution of Ecuador and the socio-cultural context in which we develop.

Objetivos específicos:

1.- Fomentar la visibilidad y participación de las poblaciones GLBTI en las Islas Galápagos a través de actos socio-culturales de socialización e integración.

2.- Establecer varios espacios para que la ciudadanía tenga la oportunidad de conocer más de cerca a la comunidad GLBTI, su cultura, sus derechos y nuevas conquistas tomando como marco de referencia la Constitución del Ecuador y el contexto socio cultural en que nos desarrollamos.

Activities

  • Create links with all social, political, cultural, and artistic organizations linked to LGBTI populations so that they can present their proposals and activities within the framework of the celebration of the Pride at the national level.
  • Meetings to exchange experiences of LGBTI militancy and activism that inform LGBTI citizens and their families and the general public about the rights and obligations of our populations.
  • The cinema is a space for the representation of collective imaginaries. In this sense, it is proposed to make a sample of LGBTI cinema, with the support of the El Lugar Sin Límites Film Festival, which gathers titles that express the central theme of the LGBTI Pride.
  • Artistic exhibition, make a retrospective of the works of professional and non-professional artists that address the central theme of the Pride in conjunction with the collective 'No Place Contemporary Art'

  • Street Jazz Dance Workshop: - FREE - Street Jazz Dance classes with the emblematic dancer Mino Conti. (4 hours of workshop in each Island)

  • LGBTI PRIDE 2018 DJing Workshop: -GRATIS- DJing classes aimed at bar owners and interested in this branch with 3 recognized DJs from mainland Ecuador. (4 hours of workshop on each island)

  • Actividades

  • Crear nexos con todas las organizaciones sociales, políticas, culturales, artísticas vinculadas con las poblaciones LGBTI para que planteen sus propuestas y actividades dentro del marco de la celebración del Orgullo a nivel nacional.
  • Encuentros de intercambio de experiencias de la militancia y el activismo LGBTI que informen a los ciudadanos LGBTI y a sus familiares y público en general sobre los derechos y obligaciones de nuestras poblaciones.
  • El cine es un espacio de representación de los imaginarios colectivos. En este sentido, se propone realizar una muestra de cine LGBTI, con el apoyo del Festival de Cine El Lugar Sin Límites y la Corporación CineMemoria organizadores de los EDOC (Festival de Cine Documental- Encuentros del Otro Cine), reunirán títulos que expresen el tema central del Orgullo LGBTI.
  • Exposición artística, hacer una retrospectiva de las obras de los artistas profesionales y no profesionales que aborden la temática central del Orgullo en conjunto con el colectivo ‘No Lugar Arte Contemporáneo’
  • Taller Street Jazz Dance: - GRATIS- Clases de Street Jazz Dance con los emblemáticos bailarines Mino Conti y Andrés Proaño. (4 horas de taller en cada Isla)

  • Taller de Djing ORGULLO LGBTI 2018: -GRATIS- Clases de DJing dirigidas a propietarios de bares e interesados en esta rama con 3 DJs reconocidos de Ecuador continental. (4 horas de taller en cada isla)

¿Are you willing to give your contribution to create these necessary spaces for LGBTI rights in the Galapagos Islands?

¿Estás dispuesto a dar tu aporte para crear estos espacios necesarios para los derechos LGBTI en las Islas Encantadas?  

Beneficiaries:

  • In the first place, the citizens of the cities and islands of the Galapagos Archipelago (Isabela, Santa Cruz and San Cristóbal) in which the activities will take place, who will have the opportunity to learn about the culture and reality of the community. GLBTI, this will also allow tourists and visitors to recognize that these cities are INTEGRATING and respectful of the difference.
  • Supporters, invite social movements such as women colleagues, Afro-descendant populations, indigenous people, migrants, etc.

  • Being the first time that LGBTI Pride days will be held in the Enchanted Islands, we expect a first contact with the population of the Islands, in order to promote visibility and respect for LGBTI populations, as mandated by the Constitution of Ecuador.

  • Beneficiarios:

  • En primer lugar, los y las ciudadanas de las ciudades e islas del Archipiélago de Galápagos (Isabela, Santa Cruz y San Cristóbal) en que se realizarán las actividades, quienes tendrán la oportunidad de conocer de cerca sobre la cultura y la realidad de la comunidad GLBTI, también esto permitirá a los turistas y visitantes reconocer que estas ciudades son INTEGRADORAS y respetuosa de la diferencia.
  • Simpatizantes, invitar a los Movimientos sociales como las compañeras mujeres, poblaciones afrodescendientes, indígenas, migrantes etc.
  • Siendo la primera vez que se realizará jornadas del Orgullo LGBTI en las Islas Encantadas, esperamos un primer contacto con la población de las Islas, para así promover la visibilización y respeto hacia las poblaciones LGBTI, como manda la Constitución del Ecuador.  

WE NEED 5000 THOUSAND DOLLARS TO ACHIEVE THIS PROJECT, HELP US? / NECESITAMOS 5000 MIL DOLRES PARA LOGRAR ESTE PROYECTO, ¿NOS AYUDAS?

Taller de Djing ORGULLO LGBTI 2018: -GRATIS- Clases de DJing dirigidas a propietarios de bares e interesados en esta rama con 3 DJs reconocidos de Ecuador continental. (4 horas de taller en cada isla)

¿Are you willing to give your contribution to create these necessary spaces for LGBTI rights in the Galapagos Islands?
¿Estás dispuesto a dar tu aporte para crear estos espacios necesarios para los derechos LGBTI en las Islas Encantadas?  
Beneficiaries:

In the first place, the citizens of the cities and islands of the Galapagos Archipelago (Isabela, Santa Cruz and San Cristóbal) in which the activities will take place, who will have the opportunity to learn about the culture and reality of the community. GLBTI, this will also allow tourists and visitors to recognize that these cities are INTEGRATING and respectful of the difference.
Supporters, invite social movements such as women colleagues, Afro-descendant populations, indigenous people, migrants, etc.
Being the first time that LGBTI Pride days will be held in the Enchanted Islands, we expect a first contact with the population of the Islands, in order to promote visibility and respect for LGBTI populations, as mandated by the Constitution of Ecuador.
Beneficiarios:
En primer lugar, los y las ciudadanas de las ciudades e islas del Archipiélago de Galápagos (Isabela, Santa Cruz y San Cristóbal) en que se realizarán las actividades, quienes tendrán la oportunidad de conocer de cerca sobre la cultura y la realidad de la comunidad GLBTI, también esto permitirá a los turistas y visitantes reconocer que estas ciudades son INTEGRADORAS y respetuosa de la diferencia.
Simpatizantes, invitar a los Movimientos sociales como las compañeras mujeres, poblaciones afrodescendientes, indígenas, migrantes etc.
Siendo la primera vez que se realizará jornadas del Orgullo LGBTI en las Islas Encantadas, esperamos un primer contacto con la población de las Islas, para así promover la visibilización y respeto hacia las poblaciones LGBTI, como manda la Constitución del Ecuador.

story:
Gaza is taking its last breath

Gaza is plunging into darkness after the Israeli occupation refuses to supply Gaza Strip with fuel. The percentage of polluted water in Gaza is about 75%, which means that it lacks the minimum requirements for a decent life There is no doubt that the unjust Zionist blockade on Gaza Strip made it lose its economic balance, as the majority of its population was classified under the poverty line. The wars and aggressive attacks during the blockade have led to a deterioration in the health situation in Gaza, which means that millions of lives are in danger.

story:
Our Story

The non-profit Foot Forward Fund exists to empower women and girls in East Africa.  Among other things, we provide eco-friendly, locally made sanitary pads along with underwear and health and hygiene education to thousands of students who lack it. A collaboration between US and Tanzanian women, on a regular basis, we see firsthand the trepidation youth face when just starting their periods. So much of the anxiety comes from the taboos and mystery surround menstruation. 

Our Cycle Circle Action Kits - and you! - can help change this. 

So, What's A Cycle Circle?

Cycle Circles are beaded bracelets in bright, bold colors which help the wearer track the phases of an approximated 28-day menstrual cycle. The Foot Forward Fund sells "Action Kits" containing all the necessary supplies to make Cycle Circles - and when we say "action" - we mean it!

  • You can make Cycle Circles for yourself or to share with someone just starting menstruation. Stringing the brightly-colored wooden beads on elastic is a simple, yet thought-provoking activity. As you string, conversations and connections happen. 
  • We'll use proceeds from kit sales to fund eco-friendly menstrual hygiene products, underwear, and uplifting health and hygiene education for students living in extreme poverty in East Africa.
  • You can help our non-profit do EVEN more? After you make your Cycle Circles, return some (or all) of them to us and we'll use them to teach our menstrual hygiene education. This is an awesome way to help address an important challenge - on your own, as part of a service group, or as a family activity.

But, What Can A Bracelet Do?

For those with access to menstrual hygiene and resources, when Cycle Circles are made by or alongside a caring adult, they are a great way to eliminate the "silence" that can surround the topic of menstruation. They can be made by:

  • Groups in schools and places of worship
  • Service and other organizations wanting to demonstrate their leadership
  • Families, scouts, or students doing service projects

For those without access to menstrual hygiene and education, first and foremost, proceeds from Cycle Circle Action Kits fund this basic dignity. Plus, when completed bracelets are returned to the Foot Forward Fund, Cycle Circles can be an additional tool in East African schools for teaching about menstruation in an empowering and understandable way.

When Cycle Circles are made and shared, they can reduce the stigma surrounding menstruation and remind the maker and wearer that menstruation is a sign of a health. We believe: Understand Your Cycle, Understand Yourself!

Why Is This So Important?

In the developing world:

  • Students lacking the basic tools to manage menstruation can miss up to FOUR SCHOOL DAYS EACH MONTH. The burden of chronic absences are a factor in school dropout.
  • Desperation can prompt an individual to seek less than ideal menstruation interventions - including soil, leaves, newspaper, rags, or worse. Infections can have devastating results.

We pair eco-friendly compostable pads with underwear (which many lack) and health and hygiene education. The students we are privileged  to serve receive dignity, understanding, and the opportunity to stay in school, a critical factor in reducing extreme poverty.

    Our Products Are Made by Local Women.

    The funds generated from Cycle Circles will allow our menstrual hygiene program to soar and generate revenue to uplift women, too!  Already, we employ 13 women who run our eco-friendly, 100% compostable sanitary pad production facility in Tanzania (with a second facility in the works in Kenya) - check it out here! The technology behind our pads - used under a humanitarian license by Aakar Innovations - allows us to create pads in a small facility run and operated by women earning a fair wage. 

    Join Our "Circle" and Please Share Our Campaign Today.

    We're proud of our work to support this critical need in East Africa - and create a positive dialogue about menstruation - and health and hygiene equity - in the United States and far beyond. Please join our community by purchasing a Cycle Circle Action Kit, sponsoring one or more students (with or without purchasing an Action Kit) - or joining in our campaign by sharing it, far and wide!

story:
Short Summary

My name is Derrick Davis and I am currently incarcerated in the state of Pennsylvania. After been given a life sentence at the age of 23 I began to read and learn various historical books. Due to a change in the law I will be home soon and have made it my goal to make sure young people learn from their history so they do not make the same mistakes that I did. I firmly believe that we learn from out past we will not repeat it.

Your contributions to YouthMindsMatter will help me to do just that. We are a 501(c)(3) organization whose goal is to make sure that are children have the educational experience they need in order to not only be successful but to not repeat the mistakes of the people that they may see each and every day. 

By helping us reach this goal you will be helping 15 young people take a trip to the various museums throughout the City of Philadelphia, you will also be helping us to provide food as well as school supplies, uniforms, clothing, counseling, and other activities to the youth in impoverished communities.

What We Need & What You Get

We are asking for 2,500 dollars. These funds will allow us to give our young people a chance to see a part of their city that many of them do not even know about. These donations will pay for their transportation, food and snacks for the day, museum entrance fees, as well as a gift from the organization. 

These children that we have the opportunity of helping will know they will not be forgotten. They will continue to have these experiences as a way for them to continue to grow.

If we don't reach our goal we will be truly humbled by all donations that we receive. All unused funds will be deposited and be used for to help buy needed items for the children in our community and to fund possible future trips.

The Impact

By helping YouthMindsMatter you will not be simply helping a local non profit you will be helping us expand the minds of young people. Our motto is Secure our Youth...Secure our Future. We know once our young people are secure in learning from our past our future is in fact secure. 

Risks & Challenges

We know we may not reach our goal in this short amount of time. We also believe that our children our in need. There is no magic wand that will fix everything but there are only steps.  YouthMindsMatter is taking this first step in help. 

Other Ways You Can Help

We know everyone cannot contribute. We just ask that you share our webpage www.youthmindsmatter.org, our Facebook YouthMindsMatter or even subscribe to our YouTube page #YouthMindsMatter

story:
My name is Pamela Golliet CPM. I am a midwife, a mother, a Christian, and a quilter. I have been catching babies for many years. It is my calling and my passion. In the last few years, persecution of midwives has been increasing worldwide. Midwives have faced police at their doors, jail time, bankruptcy, and even threats to their lives and professions.  This includes midwives in the so-called legal states and countries. 

I practiced as a licensed midwife for many years. However, because I supported women in things such as VBAC I was put under a microscope. My license was taken away a few months ago based on spurious charges. I have done nothing wrong. My clients are all happy with my care and aghast at what is happening. I have never had a complaint by a client. 

Now, I am now facing yet another "complaint" from the State. Apparently after they pulled my license, I forgot to modify one small part of my website that mentioned a license. Once I was notified of that, I took down my website and changed it immediately. However that wasn't enough for the State, and they filed charges alleging that I had done it deliberately and was misleading the public. They ignored my defense, as is typical, and decided to fine me $5000 to be paid within one year. I cannot charge for services, and have not been able to find work. 

Many other midwives in my area have faced similar issues. We are legal in Washington,   so those who would prefer we don't exist are using financial means to bankrupt us out of business.  The state won't be happy until we are all underground or have left the state. 

Please consider donating. Funds will be used to pay the fines and legal fees.  Any excess funds raised will be going to a group that funds legal fees of persecuted midwives. This is a huge need as none of us are wealthy! See the Facebook group Supporters of Sisters in Chains for more information. 

Even if you can't donate, please make some noise! This issue is ongoing all over the USA and the world! When you restrict or elminate midwives, you restrict or eliminate the rights of women to make informed choices about their pregnancy care. Share this campaign, talk to people. Talk to your local midwives and ask how you can help! 

Donors will all get a hand made thank you. It might be something knit or quilted or baked. But all include my undying gratitude.


THANK YOU!!!!! And God bless you.

story:
/begin satire

These are complicated times in which we live. Red America, Blue America, it’s all so confusing. Who can keep up?  It’s time to move on. It’s time to stand up and relieve ourselves of our differences. Let’s forget about the trivial things that divide us. It’s time to stop this divisiveness and the bickering and celebrate what may be the last two indisputable, unalternativeable  facts that bring us together ; Our Great Leader is orange and we all pee yellow. It is in this spirit of unity that we hereby introduce PEEOTUS urinal targets! What better way to celebrate the unifying orange and yellow that brings us together as a nation than to take some time to thoughtfully, purposely, and celebratoriously pee on the stately ginger countenance of our 45th commander-in-chief while reflecting on our strength as a nation and the steadfastness we exemplify as the best and most powerful humans that the earth has ever known. 

This is real. This is not fake news and we will not be swayed by fake news. We will not let the dishonest media’s scurrilous and libelous and laughable lies such as Russian pay-for-pee to distract us, nor will we sit idly by while the undocumented continue to steal our jobs and our children. No. We will stand up. We will stand up and we will pee. Big league. Let’s take the power back from golden shower distractions and the terrible, terrible, nasty detractors who have insulted the dignity of the most fantastic country in the history of the earth by using terrible slurs such as Mango Mussolini, Orange Hitler, Cheeto Jesus, Orange Anus, Carrot in Chief, Agent Orange, Spraytan von Clownface, and many others too vile to name here, to describe our Great Leader, the most successful and accomplished business man in human history. It is a national disgrace that there are people who can even ponder this kind of disrespect for a man who won more votes in more backwaters than every other winning president over the last 300 years combined. We need to do something to fight this. Whether you’re a Democratic or a Republican, White or off-white,  man or woman*, this is your president and our mission is to remind every citizen of this one urinal at a time. But we can’t do this without you!

*With your funding and support we hope to be able to bring this technology to the lady citizens too by developing a female-friendly version very, very soon. It will be fantastic. Believe us. (In the meantime you might be able to use one of these. Also, for the ladies: net proceeds go to Planned Parenthood)

We’re glad you asked. We can think of no better vehicle for our mission of urinal unity and national peeing pride than the fantastic crowd funding IndieGoGo Platform. It truly is fantastic. And you are fantastic. We hope to be able to be able to shower America with our vision and we can’t do that without you, the people. With your modest pledge you can receive your very own PEEOTUS urinal targets  to bring to your community gas station, bar, theater, church, synagogue, or even mosque, while furthering our goal of being able to manufacture 20,000 targets to spread across the United States and BEYOND. You won’t just be supporting us, you’ll be supporting you and your great country. Join us. Be “secret agents” of Peeotus and let your voice be heard from the great Crappers of California to the Washrooms of Washington, from the Toilets of Texas, to the majestic Lavatories of Louisiana. We can make this happen. We can show the world that Orange is the new black and that there’s one orange life that matters the most. It is no coincidence that when Blue and Red are mixed you get Orange. And it is no coincidence that you’re reading this right now. Stand up for what’s right. Do your part. Help make America Great Again. Pee se Puede!   

By doing a giant production lot we can get many thousands manufactured at once by our contract manufacturers, ship them direct to an order fulfillment center,contract their services to sort, and ship the goods straight to your door! That lets us keep our day jobs, and gets the product to you in the most efficient manner. It also means by taking part in this campaign you’re helping create jobs for real people in the heartland of the USA.This is about American ingenuity, craftsmanship, and hard-work.  In order to account for that the prices are a tad higher than they might be if this were a continual production program in a far-away land. We refuse to help the dishonest economies of countries like China and India and Mexico and Canada and Europe and because of that, we’ve had to be a little conservative in pricing to be sure we’re able to follow through with our America First ethics. Also, because the accounting (taxing) that crowd funding does around shipping/handling is a little funny, we’ve rolled the price of handling and shipping (to the US) into the pledge amounts, further requiring a little conservative padding. If you want liberal pricing, go to Crooked Hillary's Indiegogo page. There should be minimal risk as far as successfully manufacturing and distributing these items to our patient, fantastic, and outstanding supporters. We have many years of experience in design and shipping product. We prototyped these items with our in-house laser cutter.  The production run will be made from similar material but utilizing production scale machines at proper manufacturing facilities. The biggest risks we foresee are: overloading production capacity or consuming all of the raw materials of a supplier.  Our manufacturers expect 20,000 units to take about 7-10 days to cut. 

/end satire

Yeah, yeah, we know - Here's the real deal: We understand this seems childish and immature. And it is, it's playful. And we all could stand to play a bit more. Certainly we're pretty sure you need that right now, because there's a lot to freak out about. This orange muppet and his cronies are attacking everything the majority of Americans have historically held dear to their hearts. So this stunt is actually part of a long game effort to rejuvenate that subversive, individualist, wild-west, community nature that is the fabric of our American society.

This is really not about making money, this is about impact. This is about inspiring you and your friends to go out there and have a little fun with your political action. And then, hopefully do your own ridiculous, humorous, political stunts. 

If we are successful, and we did the accounting correctly, there should be a net win here:

  1. You get to pee with pride while supporting your country. 
  2. You and your friends are inspired to take your own action to stand up for what's right by creating your own projects. 
  3. With enough support, maybe 45 will notice us. 
  4. We don’t go bankrupt (mega win!)
  5. And, profits will be donated to Planned Parenthood.
  6. This is only the beginning. 

100% Made in the USA. 100% Satisfaction Guaranteed!

Your Concerns:

We've heard from some people that they're concerned about having this associated with their social media accounts.  We would like those people to take a step back and ask themselves: Are we already there? Have we already given up our 1st Amendment rights?  F*CK NO we haven't, and if that one goes, abandon ship. And, if we don't re-energize and act in every way possible, that seems like the direction this nutjob wants to take us. So please, understand we are working with some top attorneys to help us be sure we can protect your information as best we can. We promise to never sell or distribute your information and we will work vehemently to protect our customers (we work with top-notch attorneys who get it).

Your turn

Are you still running from one protest to the next, signing a gazillion petitions, but still waking up every morning looking at the news feed and kinda losing your sh*t a little, or more likely, you're even giving up a little? You are, aren't you? You're not signing so many petitions, we know you're not picking up the phone and making all those calls....it's called fatigue.

That's what they want.

Know what he doesn't want? We're pretty sure he doesn't want you to piss on his face.  Not because he's a belligerent narcissistic sociopath. No, because doing so will re-energize your political action spirit! 

What could be better?! Because, seriously, wtf?! At this point it seems like there really couldn’t be a much better way than getting back at this belligerent narcissist in a way that will likely really rile him up.

So, show your friends… that it’s actually not that hard to pull off something like this.  Come up with your own idea: maybe it’s not mass manufacturing (that just happens to be a specialty of ours), maybe it’s a coding project, or a knitting project, maybe you mow lawns, or put on events that get the attention of the media. Take what you’re good at, be creative, collaborate, have fun and apply it towards the common good. The resistance is all for one, and one for all.

Finally: Because if we want to Make America Greater we need to look at what actually makes us Great. It's not the wars, it's not grasping for the past, it's not hate, not dogmatic rule. It has always been our independent, forward-thinking, science-based technological development, our creativity, our arts, our community, our social stewardship. We must adopt and adapt to what the future holds, not run and hide from it. If we stay strong, it will always be a place that offers the freedom of thought, speech, religion, and gender that offers the emotional and brain space necessary to allow ingenuity to flourish. The Great American Melting-pot is a brain pump that attracts the best, the brightest, the greatest from all over the world. 

It is the combination of those things that we have all championed that have helped us be a role-model of stability; they are what has always made America Great over the years. 

So please help us recharge the resistance with humor and satisfaction!

 

You get it right?!

Tell your friends.

I mean, seriously though…internet, you know what to do.

If you'd like to make your own urinal targets, the vector files are freely available at our site: http://trickledowndesign.com

Trickle Down Design LLC is a volunteer run organization. If you'd like to collaborate with us please visit our website and contact us: info@trickledowndesign.com, IG: @trickledowndesign

 

#peesist

- subversive empowerment
- humorous activism

 

#disobedience #trumpShowers #goldenshowers #peesepuede #makeamericaurinateagain #peeotus #resist #disobedientobjects #trickledowndesign #diy #resisttrump #trump #resistance #peesistance

It’s time to stop this divisiveness and the bickering and celebrate what may be the last two indisputable, unalternativeable  facts that bring us together ; Our Great Leader is orange and we all pee yellow. It is in this spirit of unity that we hereby introduce PEEOTUS urinal targets! What better way to celebrate the unifying orange and yellow that brings us together as a nation than to take some time to thoughtfully, purposely, and celebratoriously pee on the stately ginger countenance of our 45th commander-in-chief while reflecting on our strength as a nation and the steadfastness we exemplify as the best and most powerful humans that the earth has ever known. This is real. This is not fake news and we will not be swayed by fake news. We will not let the dishonest media’s scurrilous and libelous and laughable lies such as Russian pay-for-pee to distract us, nor will we sit idly by while the undocumented continue to steal our jobs and our children. No. We will stand up. We will stand up and we will pee. Big league. Let’s take the power back from golden shower distractions and the terrible, terrible, nasty detractors who have insulted the dignity of the most fantastic country in the history of the earth by using terrible slurs such as Mango Mussolini, Orange Hitler, Cheeto Jesus, Orange Anus, Carrot in Chief, Agent Orange, Spraytan von Clownface, and many others too vile to name here, to describe our Great Leader, the most successful and accomplished business man in human history. It is a national disgrace that there are people who can even ponder this kind of disrespect for a man who won more votes in more backwaters than every other winning president over the last 300 years combined. We need to do something to fight this. Whether you’re a Democratic or a Republican, White or off-white,  man or woman*, this is your president and our mission is to remind every citizen of this one urinal at a time. But we can’t do this without you!*With your funding and support we hope to be able to bring this technology to the lady citizens too by developing a female-friendly version very, very soon. It will be fantastic. Believe us. (In the meantime you might be able to use one of these. Also, for the ladies: net proceeds go to Planned Parenthood)We’re glad you asked. We can think of no better vehicle for our mission of urinal unity and national peeing pride than the fantastic crowd funding IndieGoGo Platform. It truly is fantastic. And you are fantastic. We hope to be able to be able to shower America with our vision and we can’t do that without you, the people. With your modest pledge you can receive your very own PEEOTUS urinal targets  to bring to your community gas station, bar, theater, church, synagogue, or even mosque, while furthering our goal of being able to manufacture 20,000 targets to spread across the United States and BEYOND. You won’t just be supporting us, you’ll be supporting you and your great country. Join us. Be “secret agents” of Peeotus and let your voice be heard from the great Crappers of California to the Washrooms of Washington, from the Toilets of Texas, to the majestic Lavatories of Louisiana. We can make this happen. We can show the world that Orange is the new black and that there’s one orange life that matters the most. It is no coincidence that when Blue and Red are mixed you get Orange. And it is no coincidence that you’re reading this right now. Stand up for what’s right. Do your part. Help make America Great Again. Pee se Puede!   By doing a giant production lot we can get many thousands manufactured at once by our contract manufacturers, ship them direct to an order fulfillment center,contract their services to sort, and ship the goods straight to your door! That lets us keep our day jobs, and gets the product to you in the most efficient manner. It also means by taking part in this campaign you’re helping create jobs for real people in the heartland of the USA.This is about American ingenuity, craftsmanship, and hard-work.  In order to account for that the prices are a tad higher than they might be if this were a continual production program in a far-away land. We refuse to help the dishonest economies of countries like China and India and Mexico and Canada and Europe and because of that, we’ve had to be a little conservative in pricing to be sure we’re able to follow through with our America First ethics. Also, because the accounting (taxing) that crowd funding does around shipping/handling is a little funny, we’ve rolled the price of handling and shipping (to the US) into the pledge amounts, further requiring a little conservative padding. If you want liberal pricing, go to Crooked Hillary's Indiegogo page. There should be minimal risk as far as successfully manufacturing and distributing these items to our patient, fantastic, and outstanding supporters. We have many years of experience in design and shipping product. We prototyped these items with our in-house laser cutter.  The production run will be made from similar material but utilizing production scale machines at proper manufacturing facilities. The biggest risks we foresee are: overloading production capacity or consuming all of the raw materials of a supplier.  Our manufacturers expect 20,000 units to take about 7-10 days to cut. /end satireYeah, yeah, we know - Here's the real deal: We understand this seems childish and immature. And it is, it's playful. And we all could stand to play a bit more. Certainly we're pretty sure you need that right now, because there's a lot to freak out about. This orange muppet and his cronies are attacking everything the majority of Americans have historically held dear to their hearts. So this stunt is actually part of a long game effort to rejuvenate that subversive, individualist, wild-west, community nature that is the fabric of our American society.This is really not about making money, this is about impact. This is about inspiring you and your friends to go out there and have a little fun with your political action. And then, hopefully do your own ridiculous, humorous, political stunts. If we are successful, and we did the accounting correctly, there should be a net win here:
You get to pee with pride while supporting your country. 
You and your friends are inspired to take your own action to stand up for what's right by creating your own projects. 
With enough support, maybe 45 will notice us. 
We don’t go bankrupt (mega win!)
And, profits will be donated to Planned Parenthood. 

This is only the beginning. 
100% Made in the USA. 100% Satisfaction Guaranteed!Your Concerns:We've heard from some people that they're concerned about having this associated with their social media accounts.  We would like those people to take a step back and ask themselves: Are we already there? Have we already given up our 1st Amendment rights?  F*CK NO we haven't, and if that one goes, abandon ship. And, if we don't re-energize and act in every way possible, that seems like the direction this nutjob wants to take us. So please, understand we are working with some top attorneys to help us be sure we can protect your information as best we can. We promise to never sell or distribute your information and we will work vehemently to protect our customers (we work with top-notch attorneys who get it).Your turnAre you still running from one protest to the next, signing a gazillion petitions, but still waking up every morning looking at the news feed and kinda losing your sh*t a little, or more likely, you're even giving up a little? You are, aren't you? You're not signing so many petitions, we know you're not picking up the phone and making all those calls....it's called fatigue.That's what they want.Know what he doesn't want? We're pretty sure he doesn't want you to piss on his face.  Not because he's a belligerent narcissistic sociopath. No, because doing so will re-energize your political action spirit! What could be better?! Because, seriously, wtf?! At this point it seems like there really couldn’t be a much better way than getting back at this belligerent narcissist in a way that will likely really rile him up.So, show your friends… that it’s actually not that hard to pull off something like this.  Come up with your own idea: maybe it’s not mass manufacturing (that just happens to be a specialty of ours), maybe it’s a coding project, or a knitting project, maybe you mow lawns, or put on events that get the attention of the media. Take what you’re good at, be creative, collaborate, have fun and apply it towards the common good. The resistance is all for one, and one for all.Finally: Because if we want to Make America Greater we need to look at what actually makes us Great. It's not the wars, it's not grasping for the past, it's not hate, not dogmatic rule. It has always been our independent, forward-thinking, science-based technological development, our creativity, our arts, our community, our social stewardship. We must adopt and adapt to what the future holds, not run and hide from it. If we stay strong, it will always be a place that offers the freedom of thought, speech, religion, and gender that offers the emotional and brain space necessary to allow ingenuity to flourish. The Great American Melting-pot is a brain pump that attracts the best, the brightest, the greatest from all over the world. It is the combination of those things that we have all championed that have helped us be a role-model of stability; they are what has always made America Great over the years. So please help us recharge the resistance with humor and satisfaction! You get it right?!Tell your friends.I mean, seriously though…internet, you know what to do.If you'd like to make your own urinal targets, the vector files are freely available at our site: http://trickledowndesign.comTrickle Down Design LLC is a volunteer run organization. If you'd like to collaborate with us please visit our website and contact us: info@trickledowndesign.com, IG: @trickledowndesign #peesist- subversive empowerment- humorous activism #disobedience #trumpShowers #goldenshowers #peesepuede #makeamericaurinateagain #peeotus #resist #disobedientobjects #trickledowndesign #diy #resisttrump #trump #resistance #peesistance

story:
About Us: 

    As four students from the University of Tennessee, Knoxville, we naturally have diverse backgrounds. Despite our differences, we came together to support Bridge because of our commitment to our community. Read more about why we each chose to get involved below:

Parker: Three years ago, I met a good friend of mine: she was smart, charismatic, and a natural-born leader. She was also a refugee. Fleeing violence in her native country of Sudan, Lala Hilizah and her family came to America in 2000, and have been living in Tennessee ever since. While she hasn't forgotten her roots, she never let her identity as a refugee limit her potential. She is now a sophomore at the University of the South, Sewanee. Her example inspired me to support Bridge so that more people like her would have access to the opportunity that America provides.

Brian: I've always had a passion for community service, and Bridge shares that drive. By helping refugees settle into the area, Bridge actively makes east Tennessee a more diverse and welcoming place to live as well, which is something I think is important.

David: Out of all the non-profit organizations, Bridge stood out the most for me. Being a first generation student, my parents had to go through the same hardships these refugees go through. Whether it be learning the culture, language, or finding a stable job to support their family. I feel for refugees and genuinely want to help them. 

Teal: The reason why I chose Bridge happened to me very recently. My brother was studying in Europe and my mother and I went to go visit him. While on the trip, we saw thousands of Syrian refugees fleeing from their homeland and crossing Europe to find safety. I had never seen anything like this. They had nothing but the things they could carry on their backs. This caused me to want to make a difference in East Tennessee, before the problem got too far out of hand.

About Bridge: 

    Bridge Refugee Services is a nonprofit organization operating in Knoxville and Chattanooga. They have three signature programs, which includes case management, job placement, and school support. These programs ensure that refugees are able to sucessfully integrate into the community, and provide valuable lessons about American life and culture.

 

    The first program, case management, is the primary operation of Bridge. Case managers are the first contacts that clients meet at the airport, and counsel them as they adjust to life in America. This includes helping families navigate the confusing processes of accessing necessities like healthcare and utilities, as well as cultural orientation sessions in the first 90 days. 

 

    The second service Bridge offers is their employment program. In order to help families become self-sufficient quickly, they provide job readiness training, interpretation services, post-employment follow-up, and referrals to additional resources. This ensures that the refugees Bridge works with are adequately prepared for the American job market, as there are often different customs surrounding work in different countries. As a result, they are more likely to be hired, and become even more of an asset to our community.

 

    Finally, Bridge also helps parents with their School Impact program. This includes after-school tutoring and clubs/activities, parental involvement programs, training and support for Knox County Schools staff, and connection to bilingual/bicultural counselors. All parents want to see their child succeed, and that is especially true for refugees. Bridge ensures that all people can achieve that success. 

     

    As a nonprofit, Bridge relies on charitable donations to provide their services. With immigration levels rising as a whole, the need for Bridge's resources will only grow in the future, and they will need our support to meet the challenge. Every donation matters, and the more we are able to raise will help our community become a welcoming home for all people. Please consider giving to or sharing this page, and know that your support can make the American dream a little more real for our new neighbors!

story:
Giulia, libera professionista, infermiera, conduce una vita serena,  tranquilla. Persona senza grilli per la testa ma con grande voglia di affermarsi nel mondo del lavoro.

Un giorno però, questa sua vita del tutto normale, comincerà a prendere una strana piega, grazie ad una persona, che fino alla fine della storia rimarrà sconosciuta al pubblico, persona con gravi problemi psichici.

Giulia vive da sola in una piccola casa di campagna, sulle colline dell’appennino tosco romagnolo, in compagnia di tre gatti e un cane, ai quali è veramente molto legata.

Ha pochi amici, facenti parte dell’ambito lavorativo, eccetto Vittorio, che conosce ormai da una vita.

Un ex marito che da tempo vede molto sporadicamente.

A parte questo piccolo “incidente di percorso” la vita di Giulia scorre tranquillamente senza alcun problema, eccetto quelli che capitano a tutti (bollette, scadenze, etc etc).

Una sera Giulia decide di andare alla festa di compleanno di una sua collega. La festa si svolge in un locale di Firenze: pochi intimi, quasi tutti colleghi, tutte persone che si conoscono da una vita, visto che, oltre al lavoro, usano frequentarsi anche al di fuori dell’ospedale (ricordiamoci che Giulia è infermiera).

Alla festa c'è anche Vittorio, un vecchio amico di Giulia. Si conoscono oramai da 20 anni. Vittorio è l'amico con la A maiuscola sempre presente e disponibile.

Durante la festa tutti si divertono, ma Giulia, ha la sensazione di essere osservata, e in effetti, da un tavolo non molto lontano ella intravede un tipo “strano” che la guarda insistentemente… a differenza degli altri, lui è uno sconosciuto; chissà, magari è un imbucato, come spesso capita alle feste.

Lei fa finta di nulla, ma dentro di sé ha una brutta sensazione…

La brutta sensazione si estende ad un paio di altre presenze non familiari e vagamente sinistre.

Giulia si guarda intorno, fa finta di nulla e cerca di distrarsi e sorridere.

La festa continua in modo allegro e lei viene assorbita dal ritmo della serata, finché il suo sguardo non torna al tavolo dove aveva intravisto quel tipo losco: al tavolo non c'è più nessuno.

Nemmeno gli altri due tipi ci sono più.

Si è fatto tardi.

Verso una certa ora i colleghi decidono di andar via e si recano alla cassa, in quel momento Giulia si rende conto di aver perso il cellulare…

Le viene in mente il tizio che la fissava insistentemente, e in quel momento si convince che sia stato lui a rubarglielo.

Lei e i suoi colleghi cercano un po’ nel locale, guardano fuori, ma il cellulare non si trova. Poco male, si è fatto tardi e si deve tornare a casa.

Il giorno dopo, si presenta a casa di Giulia, Vittorio, l'amico di sempre, che molto gentilmente, dopo essersi accomodato, le offre un suo vecchio cellulare, cosiddetto muletto, tanto per far si che ella possa continuare a comunicare telefonicamente.

Giulia accetta di buon grado, ringraziandolo.

La sera stessa Giulia si reca dal suo gestore telefonico e si fa dare una nuova SIM, spiegando che le era stato rubato il telefono la sera precedente.

Tutto ok, cambio fatto, Giulia ha di nuovo il proprio numero…

Adesso penserete che sia tutto ok. SBAGLIATO, da qui cominceranno i suoi guai.

Quando abbiamo deciso di girare un documentario sulla storia di Giulia, ci siamo messi subito a cercare un produttore che finanziasse il film. Non è facile trovarne di questi tempi e così siamo dovuti partire da soli, poi durante le riprese, ci era stato promesso un piccolo finanziamento MAI avvenuto. Man mano che il lavoro procedeva, però, ci è apparso sempre più chiaro che questo documentario era giusto realizzarlo dal basso, insieme  a voi. La storia di Giulia, infatti, è una storia che viene dal basso e che potrebbe accadere ad ognuno di noi.

Perciò approdare al crowdfunding ci è apparso del tutto naturale.

Con le nostre poche risorse siamo riusciti ad arrivare fin qui. Da soli non possiamo più andare avanti con le riprese. Adesso ci serve il vostro aiuto o questa storia non potrà essere raccontata. Per questo vi chiediamo di darci una mano a produrre il documentario, per fare in modo che questa storia possa appartenere a tutti.

Vi chiediamo di diventare produttori di STALKING, MESSAGGI DA UNO SCONOSCIUTO, ognuno con quel che può. Anche pochi euro sono importanti. E se qualcuno non può permettersi nemmeno quelli, fa niente, basta che diffonda questa pagina sui social network e anche così ci avrà dato un aiuto prezioso.

I soldi raccolti serviranno per:

Affitto attrezzatura tecnica per le riprese (videocamere e microfoni)

Acquisto hard disk per i back up del materiale girato

Compensi per le persone che lavoreranno con noi                                         

Costi di viaggio e di mantenimento nelle trasferte

Acquisizione materiale d'archivio

Diritti d'autore sulle musiche che utilizzeremo

Montaggio, grafica e post produzione

 

Un grazie di cuore a tutti quelli che vorranno partecipare a quest’avventura

story: Vocational training means that the individual learns a profession in order to work in it, and vocational training includes several forms, namely: theoretical, practical and field training, after which the trainee acquires the technical skills necessary to perform his profession in the required manner, but the technical and movement skills acquired by the trainee are insufficient alone to qualify him, Rather, he should have the ability to adapt to work conditions, by acquiring new social habits and psychological trends that enable him to adapt and adapt to his work conditions, and he must also abandon some of his old habits and trends that hinder his performance at work.For example, he has to get accustomed to coming to work on a specific daily date, and he should not leave before the departure date ends, and to abide by the laws and regulations of the institution in which he works, in addition to dealing with his bosses and colleagues in a way that guarantees the completion of work without encroaching on the competencies of others.Objectives of vocational training To achieve the principle of complementarity between theory and practice, through the trainee's acquisition of both the theoretical information and practical skills needed to perform the work. Preparation of skilled technical workers and professionals in various fields of professional work. Achieving the response to the requirements of the labor market and society. Working according to quality standards. Giving the trainee the ability to deal with modern technical tools. Giving the trainee correct behavioral habits, such as: accuracy, preservation of the environment and commitment to time. Development of positive values ​​among the trainee, such as: creativity, team work, respect for work, and taking responsibility. The opportunity for those with potentials to complete enrollment requirements in higher education institutions if they wish
story_txt: Vocational training means that the individual learns a profession in order to work in it, and vocational training includes several forms, namely: theoretical, practical and field training, after which the trainee acquires the technical skills necessary to perform his profession in the required manner, but the technical and movement skills acquired by the trainee are insufficient alone to qualify him, Rather, he should have the ability to adapt to work conditions, by acquiring new social habits and psychological trends that enable him to adapt and adapt to his work conditions, and he must also abandon some of his old habits and trends that hinder his performance at work.For example, he has to get accustomed to coming to work on a specific daily date, and he should not leave before the departure date ends, and to abide by the laws and regulations of the institution in which he works, in addition to dealing with his bosses and colleagues in a way that guarantees the completion of work without encroaching on the competencies of others.Objectives of vocational training To achieve the principle of complementarity between theory and practice, through the trainee's acquisition of both the theoretical information and practical skills needed to perform the work. Preparation of skilled technical workers and professionals in various fields of professional work. Achieving the response to the requirements of the labor market and society. Working according to quality standards. Giving the trainee the ability to deal with modern technical tools. Giving the trainee correct behavioral habits, such as: accuracy, preservation of the environment and commitment to time. Development of positive values ​​among the trainee, such as: creativity, team work, respect for work, and taking responsibility. The opportunity for those with potentials to complete enrollment requirements in higher education institutions if they wish

story:
Follow us on Facebook.

Introduction

We at DayOne care about women's rights. DayOne is driven to fill the gap caused by the abolishment of support for iNGOs working in the field of family planning. We are a social enterprise determined to counteract the decree that the Trump administration signed on their first day in office. 

To achieve our goal we sell condoms designed with funny winks to the one responsible for this travesty. For each condom you buy, we will ship one women’s condom to iNGOs providing sexual aid work in target countries. The condoms are comical, merry and striking and therefore they make great gifts and promotion material for events and women's marches.

So while you get a good laugh and well… get lucky, you support the rights of women overseas!

 

What We Need & What You Get

To spearhead the DayOne campaign we need 10.000$ to start the production of our condoms. 

You will receive a package that outlines your support for women's rights. The condoms are already designed and contain funny slogans like ’’TOTAL (S)CUMBAGS” and ’’HE WILL BE GREAT AGAIN”. We apologize in advance for the excessive use of capital letters. Though only a bit. 

When you support our crowdfunding campaign we will enable you to share your mind-blowing slogans with us. The most funny slogans will be printed and you might see your slogan on the condoms send to our supporters across the globe. It's glorious, you'll love it.

We are also open to your opinion on preferred ways to spend the funds that we gathered. DayOne has already evaluated several opportunities to fund family planning operations in Sub-Sahara Africa. This runs from distribution of female condoms, IUDs and education to supporting the clinic in East Congo where Denis Mukwege operates victims of sexual violence for free. However, we enable our supporters to leave their advice and comments on preferred ways of spending the donation and maximizing our impact. Options for funding will vary according to the total amount we gather. 

Our condoms will be available in packaged sets of 6 or 12 pieces. The box outlines your support for women's rights and is great gift to yourself, your friends and for the women we will support through your help. Our condoms also come in larger amounts (shipped in a regular box) for yourself, parties, events or women's marches.    

DayOne wants to show that private initiatives can counteract the gap of funding by Trumps decree. Therefore this crowdfunding campaign is just the start of DayOne, the more we earn, the more women we can help and the better we are in fighting the consequences of the abolishment. DayOne strives to far exceed the 10.000$ campaign once our message goes viral. In case you do not need condoms, we are also happy to take your donation. 

We welcome you to be part of the DayOne movement in favor of cooperation, diversity and equality!

Trumpets will be delivered worldwide so you can order them from any country.  

This is an all-or-nothing campaign because we need a minimum amount of donations to make sure our operations will have the desired impact. 

The importance of access to family planning for women with little means

  • She should be able to decide about her body and health just like women with more means,
  • It prevents girls from dropping out of school early due to pregnancies,
  • ... and therefore it raises the opportunities for them to earn a decent income,
  • It enables them to chose to not have more children when unable to feet them or provide for medical care,
  • Lower numbers of pre-natal and maternal mortality in women unable to take the medical check-ups they should,
  • It prevents accumulation of STDs and suffering in men, women and children,
  • Preventing unwanted pregnancies is sustainable and relieves the pressure on natural resources,
  • It gives them the opportunity to provide higher standard parenting to the children already born.

Check our Facebook page.

story:
QUIENES SOMOS?

SOMOS CARPE DIEM:

Somos un grupo de personas de diferentes perfiles que se ha unido para dejar un legado a la ciudad y trascender en la comunidad, dibujando sonrisas a través de una GRANJA URBANA, aportando a los objetivos del desarrollo sostenible como son:

  • Fin de la pobreza (oportunidad de empleo)
  • El cero hambre
  • La producción y consumo responsable
  • Energía asequible y no contaminante
  • Trabajo decente y crecimiento económico
QUE QUEREMOS? 

Queremos apoyar a la Corporación Superarse en su proyecto de Agro-inclusión fortaleciendo los diferentes programas de la institución, especialmente el programa de preparación para la vida autónoma que viene implementando a través de su eco huerta, convirtiéndola en una GRANJA URBANA, la cual es modelo sostenible, incluyente, educativo y comercial. 

Considerando la importancia que tiene la formación integral, las GRANJAS URBANAS es el marco idóneo para trabajar desde un enfoque participativo diferentes lineas transversales como por ejemplo: educación ambiental, salud y bienestar, mejoramiento de la economía familiar, identificación de intereses ocupacionales, sensibilización frente a la cultura del emprendimiento, y fortalecimiento de valores como el respeto, el auto cuidado, el trabajo en equipo, la solución pacífica de conflictos y apreciación de todas las formas de vida.

 

El impacto

Sumando todos los públicos que atiende la Corporación Superarse desde sus diferentes lineas de acción: Internado, externado, Vida autónoma, Ludoteca y convenios directos con otras instituciones, incluyendo una importante población con diferentes tipos de discapacidad, familias en pobreza extrema, estaríamos impactando a través de una GRANJA URBANA, 1.000 personas aprox.

 

Lo que necesitamos:

Héroes sin capas, pero con un corazón valiente capaces de apoyar para cambiar historias.

En total el proyecto de acuaponía sostenible (granja urbana) esta valorado en en $20.000 usd, de los cuales gracias a la suma de aportes llevamos recaudados un 40%.

Las formas en las que puedes ayudar:

  • Mano de obra civil
  • Donando dinero
  • Materiales como: Maderas inmunizadas, tanques IBC, paneles solares, tubería acueducto, alimentos para peces, fertilizantes, plásticos para invernaderos, pinturas epóxicas, piso anti deslizantes y pintura para exterior.
  • Compartiendo y difundiendo nuestra campaña en tus redes sociales!

 

QUEREMOS VERTE SONREIR, CUANDO TE SIENTAS TODO UN HÉROE SIN CAPA QUE SALVÓ UNA VIDA!

story:
Activist art stresses the political content of appropriated aesthetic (or performative) forms. The content is the fuel for the work's cultural innovation. Yet, what if the opposite were true? If a "activist" project's political potential lay in its formal performative relations that happened to use a specific political example. Would that affect and alter cultural production and the current political-performance model? 

Acción is Latina artist collective who attempt to produce performances and live-events using this precarious model as a mean of instigating intentional exchanges and cultural actions. Here:  http://artefuse.com/2015/09/30/political-performance-and-the-art-of-failure-124182/ --is a recent project produced by one of our members. 

The project we are currently proposing: "The Confessional" will be a continual performance that will run for the entire 2016 presidential campaign. We are openly inviting the presidential hopeful, Mr. Trump-- to come confess for his sins. Mr. Trump has publicly announced he does not believe in reconciliation. We have produced a large mahogany confessional booth, replicating the style of confessionals in Latin America during the 19th century. We will invite Mr. Trump to come confess for his sins in our booth. If Mr. Trump does not confess we will invite participants to come and for him. The sound of participants confessing will be live-streamed to a local radio station. The public will also be invited to call into the radio station to confess for Mr. Trump. 

The confessional is central to Western understanding of power structures and "truth" production. It is also a reoccurring performative gesture in American politics. "The confessional is one of the main rituals [and apparatuses] we rely on for [so called] truth." (Foucault) Within a structure of authority, the confession is a self-reflective act. But what if the during the confession the speaking subject is not the subject of the statement? How would that alter the very power-dynamics of the confessional exchange that has characterized American politics? 

In the UK, the recently constructed millennial bridge physically connects the old church of England to the Tate Modern. "Social Practice" art has been critiqued for its deep catholic roots. Yet in a age of wide spread human crisis cultural activists have been productively pulling from spiritual practice, for instance, Ben Vicker's "un-monasteries." This project is not a critique or promotion of the catholic church. It is simply using a pre-existing daily ritual to re-examine a both personal and political performative exchange.

This work will first be performed this Tuesday at 8:00 PM during the democratic GOP debate. After the initial performance it will be repeated every Sunday in different small New York Churches until Mr. Trump confesses or his presidential campaign comes to an end.

We need to raise $1,000 to fundraise this project! 
              $250 - the cost of producing the confessional booth
              $250 - the cost of having the voters registration booth 
              $500 - our artist fee, yes cultural producers should get paid too!!

Our "perks" for your contributions!
             $15 - you can send in a personal confession on behalf of Mr. Trump
             $25 - we will live-stream you into our first performance this Tuesday
             $50 - a cd of all the first performance's live confessions for Mr. Trump
             $100 - we will send you a confessional! (or if you'd prefer a project booklet)

**This project is a work of art. It will not create direct and concrete change. But we do believe it has the potential to create space for dialogue and conversation that could lead to change of the political-performative model. --With your help!

#ACCION #idontcareifmyworkisdidactic #lets_revive_autonomy #latinavoices #ornamentalactivism #giftgiving #noapologizes

story:
CHILDREN'S RIGHTS MATTER

Children’s Rights Matter! No matter who their parents are. Rainbow families are as good as any other family to provide the loving, caring and nurturing environment that children need to thrive. Still, children with LGBTIQ* parents too often cannot enjoy the same rights as children in traditional families. Societal prejudices and lack of proper legal protection are the main reasons for this. By providing proper legal recognition to rainbow families all children will be able to enjoy their rights with no discrimination. Equal marriage, automatic co-parenthood recognition at birth and joint adoption are not only a matter of equality for LGBTQI* people, they are also the essential foundations and starting point for providing children of rainbow families with the same legal status and protection of any other child. They are a key mean to safeguard the best interest of the child. Even where such essential legal foundations are already in place, the work is not over: efficient non-discrimination and inclusive policies and a narrative that values diversity are still needed for equality to be effectively enjoyed in practice.

HOW TO STRENGTHEN LGBTQ* FAMILIES

The International Family Equality Day Report 2018 will be used as a practical tool to address lobbying strategies and as a means to strengthen the visibility of rainbow families around the world. It can be used to forge alliances with other family organisations as well as with policymakers and the authorities towards the goal of recognition for all families. The collective solidarity should be strengthened in collaboration with different family forms because together, we are strong.

WHERE YOUR DONATION WILL GO

We will use your donation for the cost of printing the International Family Equality Day Report 2018 to enable us to hand it over personally to authorities, experts, LGBTQI* activists and human rights experts in the course of our advocacy work.

INTERNATIONAL FAMILY EQUALITY DAY REPORT 2018

We look forward to sharing the International Family Equality Day Report 2018. It will allow us to forge alliances with representatives from public services, institutions and politics in our struggle for recognition of all families. IFED 2018 was celebrated in 111 towns and 48 countries worldwide. —> https://internationalfamilyequalityday.org/ifed...

story:
The Story

Since an early age, it has been a dream of mine to go and visit Africa, even just for a while. Something about this continent has always excited me and I guess the main thing was that on all pictures I was seeing, people always looked so happy, somehow purely happy. I wanted to see that. Communicate with these people. Live with them. 

Now, that I have a semester away from school, the timing seemed to be perfect and I started doing my research on different options for volunteering in Africa. I was immediately overwhelmed by the huge number of projects available out there. All of them had a very good cause, but they would accommodate you in a well-furnished room and provide you with all amenities  ...  and pay $3000 dollars for 2 weeks ?! I informed myself and discovered that very often very little (if any) of this money actually goes to deserving families in the region and is mostly kept by volunteer businesses focused on profit. 

 I didn't want that. By pure accident, I  landed on a Facebook page of an NGO located in Arusha, Tanzania, concerned with providing education for kids in the villages surrounding the city of Arusha. Out of curiosity, I sent them an email acquiring about more details. As it turned out, they were not asking for any monetary contributions, there was no one you had to pay to take part in, they didn't have any hidden fees - just pay for your flights and food, they will find accommodation for you. Perfect. The NGO was very small so I was communicating directly with the founder. In no time we went over my availability, arranged all the details and I was ready for my trip to Africa.

 

The Time is Now

The time has finally come and on Novemeber 7th I am boarding a flight for Tanzania where I will spend a little more than a month. I will contribute some personal funds for the development of the school I will be at and for purchasing chairs for the library where the children study. In order to be as effective as I can be while there, I am reaching out for your help with the goal to raise $800. All the money raised will go towards providing school supplies and improving the school environment. I would be extremely thankful if you donate and contribute towards this cause. Regardless of amount, every donation will be highly appreciated and will make an enormous difference to the education in the village of Sanawari.

Thank you in advance.
