Since 2012 the International Family Equality Day (IFED) takes place every year the first Sunday in May to celebrate LGBTIQ* families all over the world. It is an awareness day that celebrates the beauty and richness of family diversity and furthers equality for everyone. Too often children with LGBTIQ* parents cannot enjoy the same rights as children in traditional families. That is why IFED increases our visibility and empowers our communities around the world.The IFED annual report highlights the activities that were held in the different countries to celebrate this day. Your donation will contribute to the printing of the report, an important tool for our advocacy activities. 

FAMILIES: UNITED WE STAND
IFED was a source of strength and motivation to stand up for equal rights for all families. We stand united within our families, sharing love, care and commitment to create an environment where every member can feel safe and flourish. We stand united with all types of families, because every family deserves equal recognition, support and respect. We stand united with our communities, to celebrate and enjoy together the beauty and richness of family diversity. We stand united with our allies: cities, organizations, institutions, and all those working with us for a more open and diverse society. We stand united across the countries, to share the joy of our celebrations and to support those who can’t yet safely be out to celebrate.

HOW TO STRENGTHEN LGBTQ* FAMILIES
The International Family Equality Day Report 2019 will be used as a practical tool to address lobbying strategies and as a means to strengthen the visibility of rainbow families around the world. It can be used to forge alliances with other family organisations as well as with policymakers and the authorities towards the goal of recognition for all families. The collective solidarity should be strengthened in collaboration with different family forms because together, we are strong.

INTERNATIONAL FAMILY EQUALITY DAY REPORT 2019We look forward to sharing the International Family Equality Day Report 2019. It will allow us to forge alliances with representatives from public services, institutions and politics in our struggle for recognition of all families. IFED 2019 was celebrated in 117 towns and 50 countries worldwide. —> https://internationalfamilyequalityday.org/ifed...

story:
PITCH IN AGAINST HUNGER 2018

FOOD SHOULD NEVER BE SOMETHING ANY HUMAN GOES WITHOUT......EVER

Fighting Hunger Nationwide

One in seven Americans rely on Food Banks to feed themselves and their families. For every $1 dollar you donate this will provide 10 meals to families in need and for every $10 dollars this will provide 100 meals. Any amount will help struggling families in need.

Poverty and hunger in America

41 million people struggle with hunger in the United States. Help us reach those that rely on our 300 Food Banks throughout the US including 14 million children and 6.4 million seniors who struggle to afford enough to eat.

I know in my heart we can do this we are the richest Nation in the World. I expect us to reach our goal and surpass it 2 times over or at least I’ll pray for this that would be an amazing 30 million meals.

Hunger threatens our nation

In The United States, 1 in 7 people struggles with hunger. Children and adults face hunger in every community across the country.Your neighbor, child’s classmate or even coworker may be struggling to get enough to eat.

Many people facing hunger are forced to make tough choices between buying food and medical bills, food and rent and/or food and transportation. This struggle goes beyond harming an individual family’s future, it can harm us all.

According to a study conducted in 2016, 72 billion pounds of food are wasted in America each year.

Partner with us help provide Needed Food to U.S. families in America. 

The World is watching lets prove we are “One Nation under God”

"PITCH IN AGAINST HUNGER 2018"

All donations raised go directly into serving the people in need at local U.S. Food Banks.

 

When we come together, we have more power.

We will provide daily updates on how many meals we are providing to local U.S. food banks.

 

Please help by sharing our story: 

PITCH IN AGAINST HUNGER 2018 
 
Local U.S. Food Banks Need our Help

 

 

5 Additional ways you can Help Fight Local Hunger

1. Educate Yourself

Knowledge is power, but to be aware is not enough. We need to challenge ourselves to not look the other direction, but rather to take action to address food insecurity issues. There are so many small things that can be done that will add up to make a huge difference. Learn hunger facts, read inspirational quotes, and find a detailed reading list full of books and websites, for people of all different ages, to learn more about hunger.

2. Volunteer at Local Food Bank or Pantry

Many volunteers find it exceptionally rewarding to help families with children or elderly family members who are struggling to provide healthy food for those who need it most. Many of these people are faced with tough decisions on where to spend their money on a low-income budget. Contact agencies in your community who provide food for the hungry. By volunteering at a food bank, you’ll be able to help families use their money to pay their bills and other expenses while still having access to healthy foods. Locate a food bank here: https://godslifematters.org/u-s-local-food-banks/

3. Prayer and Church

Reach into your heart and be thankful for the riches God has provided our country, and pray for those who do not always have access to this abundant food. Pray for guidance as you seek to be a part of the solution to our nations hunger problems. Give an extra dollar or two during the church offering this will go into helping families in your local community.

 
 

4. Write to Your Legislator 

Email, write, or call your members of Congress urge them to address the food-insecurity issues in your local communities. You can sign an online petition urging Congress to help end hunger for the families who struggle to put food on the table. There are many of us fighting hunger now in America and we can use all the help you bring.  

 

 

5. Join an Online Community

Join the World Food Programmes Online Community to receive newsletters, updates, email alerts, and information on opportunities to help end hunger, not only in the United States but worldwide.

 

Our clothing is great for work, play and all your warrior events.

QUALITY  Soft/Smooth - Heavy/Durable

Choose your design:  Pitch In Against Hunger 2018 / Gods Hands / Bridge to Heaven / Gods Life Matters / no Image on Back / Customize anyway you like
 

Size S, M, L, XL, XXL, 3L or 4L   "True to Size"

Color Chart:   

 

Thank you,  

God Bless You All

GODS LIFE MATTERS Inc a non-profit  

https://godslifematters.org/

story:
My Story

Nargiz is a 21-year-old transgender woman, a refugee from Azerbaijan. ‘It’s very dangerous’ she says of being transgender in her home country. But the danger is now a memory from the past, as she has been able to express herself freely mostly without violence from Georgian society, she says.

She has never seen her father; her mother put her into care when she was only three. She was beaten when she told her foster mother she is transgender. Boys would beat her too, telling her she’d burn in hell.

‘Once I was beaten near the house; they took my phone. When I appealed to the police for help they asked me whether I was a fag. This is why people like me are afraid to ask for help in Azerbaijan. There is no one to help transgender people. That’s why many turn to sex work. Nobody cares. Even local LGBT organisations tell you to “walk like a man, like a normal person, and people will not say anything” ’, says Nargiz.

After coming of age she left the care home. She used to deliver books and would sleep at her office. She tried to get a job in Turkey, but failed. She was planning to go to a Western European country, but eventually came to Georgia and decided to stay.

Nargiz hopes to obtain a university degree and become a lawyer.

‘My mum called once. “Is it painful?” she asked mockingly, as if I were a sex worker. Transgender women in Azerbaijan, even as children, they think about becoming sex workers when they grow up. I want to become a lawyer and prove everyone wrong. Everybody thinks all transgender people can do is a sex work.’

She is hopeful that someday life will change for better for queer people in Azerbaijan. ‘I hope someday they will be free and happy’, says Nargiz.

(extract from an article by OC Media: http://oc-media.org/a-quest-for-safe-haven-flee... ) 

What I Need 

I need to fundraise money to be able to get a hormonal treatment therapy for transgender transition. 

Because of the discrimination I have been facing in Georgia, I am not able to find a job and save money for the surgery by myself. 

I need your help and contribution to be able to live a normal life, get education and find work.

After coming of age she left the care home. She used to deliver books and would sleep at her office. She tried to get a job in Turkey, but failed. She was planning to go to a Western European country, but eventually came to Georgia and decided to stay.

I want to become a lawyer and prove everyone wrong. Everybody thinks all transgender people can do is a sex work.’

(extract from an article by OC Media: http://oc-media.org/a-quest-for-safe-haven-flee... ) 

What I Need 
I need to fundraise money to be able to get a hormonal treatment therapy for transgender transition. 
Because of the discrimination I have been facing in Georgia, I am not able to find a job and save money for the surgery by myself. 
I need your help and contribution to be able to live a normal life, get education and find work.

story:
Ci siamo scordati da dove veniamo e chi siamo, ci dimentichiamo cosa siamo stati e il fondamento del nostro essere cittadini di un Paese costruito grazie anche all'emigrazione.

I politici italiani, Ministro degli interni in primis, stanno rovinando l'Italia. I continui tweet inneggiano al razzismo, all'odio, alla propaganda dal sapore di incubi che sembravano passati. E purtroppo le azioni sono anche peggio delle parole.

Bisogna fare qualcosa. Mobilitare le teste che ancora riescono a pensare.

E abbiamo deciso di farlo con uno spot, scritto da Erri De Luca che verrà realizzato da  professionisti del settore che hanno deciso di reagire utilizzando il mezzo cinematografico.

Qui si seguito lo script del sociale e alcuni frames di storyboard realizzati per rendere visivamente l'idea.

Buona lettura e grazie davvero.

 

 

COSì VA MEGLIO?

 

1. EXT GIORNO - CAMPO ROM
Polvere, qualche ferro arrugginito, un materasso e alcuni pneumatici a terra. Le roulotte del campo sono unite tra loro da fili della corrente con panni stesi. Mucchi di immondizia di vario tipo colorano le strade di sabbia.

Bambini  sporchi e felici giocano a calcio  sotto lo sguardo di alcune anziane sedute su sedie di plastica. Due uomini sorridono mostrando una dentatura incerta. Alcune donne con abiti logori recitano la parte delle damigelle d'onore, si avvicinano a una roulotte, aprono la porta dalla quale esce una rom vestita in abiti eleganti, molto distante dal modo di vestire delle altre persone presenti.
Lei sorride maliziosa in camera.

TITOLO

"Così va meglio?"

 

2. EXT NOTTE - SPIAGGIA
Un uomo senegalese si trascina sulla sabbia. E' malridotto, indossa un giubbotto arancione di salvataggio. Crolla a terra quindi si risolleva a fatica sulle ginocchia. Le luci della spiaggia in lontananza ne delineano la figura, di spalle sembra stia pregando.

Improvvisamente in lontananza alcuni cani abbaiano e sembrano pian piano avvicinarsi, l'uomo è spaventato, ansima. Con fatica si sfila il giubbotto e cerca di alzarsi in piedi. Indossa uno smoking.

I suoi occhi sorridono anche se le labbra non possono perchè cucite.

TITOLO

"Così va meglio?"


 
3. EXT GIORNO - SOTTO IL MARE
Fondale marino. La luce filtra tra le onde di un mare in tempesta e taglia l'oscurità in più punti. Oggetti indefiniti scendono lentamente in profondità, c'è qualcosa di terribilmente musicale nel loro affondare: sono i corpi di profughi che non ce l'hanno fatta.

Uno, tre, sette finchè di fronte alla mdp affonda il corpo senza vita di un bambino: gli occhi sbarrati sembrano fissarci.

TITOLO

"Così va meglio?"

 

4. CLAIM

"Tutti gli esseri umani nascono liberi ed eguali in dignità e diritti. Essi sono dotati di ragione di coscienza e devono agire gli uni verso gli altri in spirito di fratellanza" (ART. 1 - Dichiarazione Universale dei Diritti dell'Uomo)

"Ogni individuo ha diritto alla vita, alla libertà ed alla sicurezza della propria persona" (ART. 3 - Dichiarazione Universale dei Diritti dell'Uomo)

"Ogni individuo ha diritto ad un ordine sociale e internazionale nel quale i diritti e la libertà enunciati in questa Dichiarazione possano essere pienamente realizzati" (ART. 28 - Dichiarazione Universale dei Diritti dell'Uomo)

 

 

STORYBOARD

1.

 

2.

3. 

 

 

Di cosa abbiamo bisogno?

Alla realizzazione dello spot sociale "Così va meglio?" hanno già aderito tanti professionisti del settore che lavoreranno senza percepire il proprio onorario. Anche service e laboratori hanno deciso di collaborare.

Ci sono però alcuni costi di produzione che non dipendono dalle persone e che vanno coperti. Quello che vi chiediamo è un aiuto come produttori di questo sociale. 

Se dovessimo riuscire a produrlo vi chiediamo di diffonderlo con ogni mezzo, ovviamente se credete che il messaggio e il segnale che intendiamo dare siano importanti.

 

 

Cosa vogliamo ottenere?

Niente, tutto, poco, tanto. Non lo sappiamo. Siamo sicuri che però non vogliamo stare fermi.

 

 

In che altro modo potete collaborare?

Se sei un professionista del settore e vuoi partecipare sei il benvenuto!

3. 

 
 

Di cosa abbiamo bisogno?

Ci sono però alcuni costi di produzione che non dipendono dalle persone e che vanno coperti. Quello che vi chiediamo è un aiuto come produttori di questo sociale. 
Se dovessimo riuscire a produrlo vi chiediamo di diffonderlo con ogni mezzo, ovviamente se credete che il messaggio e il segnale che intendiamo dare siano importanti.
 
 

Cosa vogliamo ottenere?
Niente, tutto, poco, tanto. Non lo sappiamo. Siamo sicuri che però non vogliamo stare fermi.

story:
Short Summary

Almost a half century ago the Young Lords Organization emerged in Chicago to prevent the displacement of the Latinx community from Lincoln Park and fight for the self-determination of Puerto Rico.  Rooted in their family histories of migration, the YLO exemplified the Third World revolutionary activism that developed in many communities of color across the United States during the late sixties.  Inspired by national liberation struggles and firmly aligned with the politics of the Black Panther Party, the YLO set up community service programs, resisted police violence, anchored the Original Rainbow Coalition, and disrupted urban removal plans for Lincoln Park.  Due to their ideology, organizing courage, and cultural resistance, the Young Lords Organization of Chicago soon influenced the creation of Young Lords chapters in other cities.

By contributing to this fundraising campaign you will support the efforts of the Young Lords to commemorate their 50th anniversary.   If you have been inspired by the history of the Young Lords please donate today!

What We Need & What You Get

The Young Lords aim to raise $2,500 to plan events, provide travel support for community leaders and Young Lords outside of Chicago, food, compensation for artists, and development of materials.  

All levels of donations are welcome.  In exchange for a generous $50 dollar donation the Young Lords have collaborated with Chicago-based cultural organizer/activist Bria Royal on a special edition 50th anniversary flyer.  The Young Lords will mail commemorative flyers to +50$ donors in October 2018.

 

All funds will go directly to the Young Lords and will be spent on 50th Anniversary initiatives.  

 

The Impact

Your donation will have a direct impact on maintaining the historical memory of the Young Lords.  Indeed, the 50th anniversary of the Young Lords Organization offers an important opportunity to revisit the revolutionary history of the YLO and to remember the Young Lords who were lost in struggle.  Mindful that Puerto Rico remains a U.S. colony and that displacement and police violence continue to harm Latinx communities in Chicago and beyond, the 50th anniversary of the YLO is also a chance to reflect upon the political lessons the history of the YLO offers to organizers facing intense challenges today.  Indeed, as the history of the Young Lords challenges narrow Black/White frameworks of U.S. racial domination, contributes to traditions of Third World socialism, and is filled with powerful examples of women and Afro-Latinx leadership, it provides political clarity to many emerging communities of resistance.

Other Ways You Can Help

Looking for other ways to support the Young Lords 50th?

  • Follow on Twitter (@YLO50)
  • Tell your friends and familia to donate - share the Indiegogo link on Facebook
  • Read and reflect on the history and impact of the YLO
  • Visit nationalyounglords.com

story:
Let's just get Catalan story sorted

  Catalonia has both historical and modern reasons. The historical fact is that once Barcelona was steeper than Madrid, it was a metropolitan city, and Catalonia was probably the most powerful part of the Iberian Peninsula. Since then, times have changed, and the Catalans all recall September 11 - Diada, or the National Day of Catalonia. This is a rather sad day for them, when they lost their independence and moved under the rule of Madrid. But the sense of national identity remains. The second reason is that Catalonia is the leader among other Spanish regions, this is the fifth part of Spain's GDP, here are the best industry and the largest number of tourists. This is a special part of the country, and all the espanians knows this.

What We Need & What You Get

Your support in the matter of independence is what catalans needed.

So come on, order a Xatonada salad, or maybe some Catalan wine?

Pledge €3 and get a postcard of Barcelona.

Pledge €6 and get a Catalan national salad.

Pledge €15 and get a fresh and tasty bread.

Pledge €30 and get a bottle of Catalan wine.

Yours support what the Catalans need. It might seem like a lot but it's only just over €3 from each European.

We promise that all products will be 100% Catalan. 

FAQs

Is this a joke?

No. Crowdfunding can really help because it's just a case of getting on and doing it. I was fed up of the Catalan crisis going round in circles, while spanish politicians are dithering, this is affecting real people. While all the posturing is going on, then it's easy for the politicians to forget that. I just thought, sod it, I'll have a crack. 

Why Catalonia?

  Catalonia already has signs of an independent state: a flag, a coat of arms, a language, a parliament, its own government.
  The region has its own police - it carries out its own control over television and radio broadcasting.
  Catalonia, which has the status of autonomy, can even boast of international missions that promote trade and investment in the region around the world.
  In Catalonia, its systems of school education and health.
  "Madrid rob us" is a true slogan. Rich Catalonia gives more than it receives from Spain.

The most difficult issue is the debts of the region.​

  Catalonia owes 52 billion euros, according to Spain.
In 2012, after the financial crisis, Spain created a special fund that ensures the flow of money to regions that are not able to independently obtain external loans. Catalonia was in the most favorable position, having received from the fund 67 billion euros.
  Catalonia without Spain can, but Spain cannot , therefore hinders independence.

How has the campaign been received?

I've been overwhelmed by the response, it’s been incredibly positive. I’ve received so many tweets, emails and messages of support and thanks. I started the campaign as quite a practical endeavour, €3 from everyone in Europe - that'll sort it. But it has really struck a chord with so many people emotionally. I feel quite emotional about it all myself now, I've had to have a sit down and a strong cup of Yorkshire Tea!

Are you just making a statement/some kind of point?

This is a real attempt to do something. At the very least, it is important to raise the issue of the great desire of the Catalan people to gain independence. We can help our Catalan friends with our support, buying wonderful Catalan products. And, perhaps, considering Barcelona as a resting place. I hope that this idea will somehow help Catalonia get a fair independence.

Have you been involved in Catalan Politics before?

I've never been involved in Catalan politics. I see the campaign as more of a helping the people than getting involved with politics.

Have you been in touch with European or Greek leaders.

I've not yet been in touch with any European leaders.

Do you have any link to IndieGoGo?

I've never been involved with IndieGoGo before. 

Are the products real or symbolic?

It’s not symbolic - all products would be sourced from Catalonia, made in Catalonia and sent from Catalonia.

What will happen to the money?

We promise that all profits will go to the Catalonia. Whether that be via the government accepting it or by other means.

Are the products real or symbolic?

It’s not symbolic - all products would be sourced from Catalonia and made in Catalonia.

Do you think that you can reach the target?

I hope very much that the campaign will reach the target, I think it will be a victory for people power. Yes it's a tall order but I truly believe it can be effective, remember it's a very small amount per person we're looking for. 

 

CATALONIA IS NOT SPAIN

CATALONIA IS FREE!
story_txt: Let's just get Catalan story sorted  Catalonia has both historical and modern reasons. The historical fact is that once Barcelona was steeper than Madrid, it was a metropolitan city, and Catalonia was probably the most powerful part of the Iberian Peninsula. Since then, times have changed, and the Catalans all recall September 11 - Diada, or the National Day of Catalonia. This is a rather sad day for them, when they lost their independence and moved under the rule of Madrid. But the sense of national identity remains. The second reason is that Catalonia is the leader among other Spanish regions, this is the fifth part of Spain's GDP, here are the best industry and the largest number of tourists. This is a special part of the country, and all the espanians knows this.What We Need & What You GetYour support in the matter of independence is what catalans needed.So come on, order a Xatonada salad, or maybe some Catalan wine?Pledge €3 and get a postcard of Barcelona.Pledge €6 and get a Catalan national salad.Pledge €15 and get a fresh and tasty bread.Pledge €30 and get a bottle of Catalan wine.Yours support what the Catalans need. story:
I would like to start off by telling you a little about myself. My name is Joey Rivers.  I served 8 years in the Army National Guard and a Veteran of the Iraq Campaign with two tours. Currently, I am a employee for Permaletter Sign Company in Billings MT.  I have three energetic children and a wife who really deserves the credit when I was deployed.

  The reason I am writing to you is that we are looking for some help on accomplishing a goal.  As a strong supporter of disabled vets and military personnel, we want to wrap a 1969 Mustang to Tribute to soldiers.  The reason we choose this method is that it is affordable and also does not damage the original paint. The tribute mustang will be wrapped in 3M 1080-brushed black met aluminum with carbon fiber accents. This design will signify the strength of U.S. military and United States through good and bad.  Accomplishing this goal, we will be able to use the 1969 Mustang to raise funds at car shows, foundations, and other charitable events for fallen and injured soldiers of our country.  This will help support such charities like (Operation Never Forgotten, Disable American Vets, Big Sky Honor Flight, as well as other charities of any.) Web sites listed below.

I am a wrap artist for a local sign company. Therefore, cost of labor is zero.  The Funds are strictly to pay for the wrapping materials I need (at my cost).  This makes it even cheaper.  The material is 1080 3m wrapping compliant material with life like texture.  It is know to last 7 to 10 years if taken care of. The cost of this project in a shop would be around $4000.00!!

Supporting a family of five is a very hard task on top of trying to do things for me. I always put the family first and this donation will be strictly for my goal.   Thank you for your time.

 

If you cannot contribute but know someone who may, please let them know of this posting.

www.bigskyhonorflight.org 

www.operationneverforgotten.org

www.sasproject.org

www.dav.org

story:
For years I worked for the mainstream media on the country's top political affairs programs in Washington, DC. We The People (WTP) are in the process of breaking the stranglehold the MSM has on America, Instead of criticizing them, let's lead them by example by sticking our necks out first to make a point. Many of the top show hosts are brilliant. They know what's up but until WTP risk something, it is hypocritical expecting them to martyr themselves first. This Protest LicensPlate is my best idea so far. Hopefully other creators will come up with even better ideas. 

Help I am Seeking

  • I am seeking the funds to mass produce the Protest Plates in order to sell them as inexpensively as possible. The cost of making an injection mold is $5,000. In addition, there are set-up and cleaning fees for every run. $20,000 will pay for the engineering and manufacturing of the injection mold. It will pay for the set-up and clean-up fees and pay for the first 1,000 pairs of mass-produced units.
  • The first 10 people who send $22, will get 1, handmade by me, Protest Plate. Maybe it will become a souvenir? There will be a lot of love in it. 
  • The next 1,000 people who send $20 will receive the first 1,000 pairs. Those people will also get the satisfaction of knowing that future protesters can get a pair for around $5 once the injection mold and engineering are paid for. 
  • Any funds in excess will be used to send free pairs to all the bloggers, new media journalists and website operators who help red-pill and inform the masses. I know how hard it is to create media. I know hard it is to get in front of a camera. I want to thank everyone I mentioned and hundreds of others that we collectively identify.

Imagine What Could Be

Your help could crystalize the movement that is ready to explode. This is a non-violent to communicate what we profess to believe in a very public way.

  • I feel the sense of anger, frustration and powerlessness expressed by constitutionalists like me. I am hoping to give people a way to stand up, be counted and push back.
  • I have successfully started 10 companies in a variety of fields from media production to biotech.
  • In March 2017, I helped organize a successful protest at the White House against Pizzagate and anti-child trafficking. Every year I produce the stage event for Rolling Thunder in front of the Lincoln Memorial on Memorial Day to support veterans. I am a dreamer and a doer.
  • Today I want to do something to help change the world.
  • I believe this campaign can morph into something far bigger and I am ready to help lead it. 

Risks & Challenges

The biggest risk is apathy. Apathy is what fuels the deepstate. They constantly pound us with memes that reinforce the false sense of powerlessness. Stop buying their BS and do something

  • We are far more powerful than we know. We are the ones we've been waiting for!
  • Instead of being frightened by police officers and other citizens, it is time those of us that have been red-pilled help others come to understand that the 99.9% are all on the same team. If not us then Who?
  • There are no knights in shining armor ready to march into DC and save us. That's our job.

Many Ways You Can Help

The deepstate will be watching this campaign. If you don't have $20, send $1. The point is displaying the willingness to stand up and be counted.  This is not about making money. This is about making a statement. We can use your voice and vote brothers and sisters. 

  • If you have some basic skills, make your own Protest Plate. Its possible to glue other words on the louvers of the plates so the cameras read a far different message than numbers on a plate. I'll explain later.
  • If anything I have said resonates with you, please spread this message. 
  • If this campaign works, I have more ideas for an open-source, transparent modern form of government using an all new biology based graphic user interface. I came up with it years ago as the anecdote for MSNBC. Its only in the last couple years that the technology was invented to support it. That will be the next campaign.

Thank you

story:
A condition that puts a lot of children at risk for many of the issues listed in this section is poverty. Lack of access to basic requirements such as food, shelter and clothing are the underlying cause of poor child health, poor child nutrition, child labour, child marriage and various other issues. It widens the economic, social, cultural, and gender disparities already present in society. Poverty essentially threatens every child right: survival, development and protection. Poverty follows a vicious cycle as poor children grow up to be poor adults who then pass on debt to their children.

Action Against Hunger was founded with a simple goal in mind: No more hungry children in India. No more deaths caused by starvation, no more irreversible damage to mental or physical health due to lack of food and water. No more denying our children their basic human right to be free from hunger.

story:
The Story

Hi. I'm Ryan. I like writing poetry, specifically Haikus. One year ago, I started creating "Fraikus" (Friday Haikus) and shared my written pieces with friends and colleagues. Now, I'm going global. I want to share my art with you while helping to make a difference in the world.

Where Will Funding Go & What You Get

Apart from the platform fees tied to using Indiegogo, all funds raised will go to World Vision Canada in support of their mission to helping families and communities in developing countries.

We have many rewards available. Check them out, I think you'll be very excited.

The Impact

You'll be supporting a global organization that's making a difference in the lives of others. In return, you'll receive a unique poem, or several of them, from a renowned Haiku artist - me.

Risks & Challenges

Sometimes I'll get writer's block, which could cause some delay in delivering your Haiku on time. I will do everything in my power to ensure it arrives in a timely manner.

Other times, you might not like the Haiku you received. If you are unsatisfied with the quality of the poem composed for you, I will send you another Haiku at no added cost.

Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean they can't help. Share this campaign with your friends and family using the Indiegogo share tools. Every little bit helps. Together, we can do our part in shaping the world for the better.

story:
Welcome to Beacon

Beacon is an immersive art and dance bar opening in Denver, Colorado.

We're super stoked to inform you that our Grand Opening Parties have dates!

December 3rd: Part 1 with The Human Experience
December 4th: Part 2 with Alex Cruz

It's gonna be one helluva weekend!
 

 

Our vision is to provide a community hub - a place of instinctual return where you can find and be surrounded by your people. Our wildly immersive spaces are designed to catalyze connecting and engaging moments with the intention to check in, not check out.

 

 

Inspired by our experiences at festivals and in cities like Tulum and Tokyo, Beacon is entirely artist-created. Our events are intentionally curated to create more authentic interaction, so that magic is always just around the corner.

 

Meet the Founders

Our names are Robert Champion and Mario Nocifera, and we're experienced event curators and community gatherers. We are opening Beacon in the heart of Denver’s RiNo Arts District, right at 29th and Larimer St. 

 

 

When we found community, our life trajectories changed. We found a true sense of belonging, experienced high degrees of personal growth, and have been living more meaningful, fun and fulfilling lives ever since. 

We believe that human connection is needed now more than ever, which is why we are focusing on creating cozy spaces that inspire more conversation as well as inclusive, high-vibe dance parties that will encourage you and fellow guests to celebrate your most authentic selves.

 

 

Fundraising 

We’ve got Beacon close to the finish line through self-funding and outside investment, however, we need at least an additional $50k to complete the build out. $20k will go toward paying local artists to complete the immersive art spaces and $30k will fund our state-of-the-art Traction Sound system. Any extra funding will go toward purchasing our own much needed CDJs.

 

 

We are offering awesome perks at discounted rates, including tickets to our two Grand Opening Parties (Human Experience Oct 2; Alex Cruz Oct 9), art room rentals, Beacoin (Beacon currency!) and more surprises that will bring you into the Beacon ethos.


 

Impact

Society is starved for meaningful spaces to connect. We are too often presented with social environments where little value is placed on relationship building and creative expression. With Beacon, we have the opportunity to build a space that reflects the unique nature of a diverse and creative community; a space that fosters meaningful connection. 

Building a bar is often met with challenges. Unforeseen construction costs have threatened our artists’ budget, so we are asking for your help.

 

 

By contributing to the Beacon Indiegogo campaign, you are funding local artists to build spaces beyond your wildest imagination which will serve as a backdrop to a truly, radically inclusive community.  Renown artists you'll be supporting include Jon and James Medina (Willow Bar Cap, Dance Floor Walls, Diamond Portal), Aleesha Anderson (A Trip to the Hive Mind),  Nueshok (Cloud LED Ceiling), and Sidney Connell (Stardust Wagon).

 

 

Stay in the Loop

Be on the lookout for Beacon’s upcoming events and new perks as the campaign unfolds by subscribing to our email list and following us on Instagram and Facebook.

 

 

Spread the Word

Unable to contribute? A share is extremely valuable to us in fundraising to the finish line. Please share this campaign with your friends using the Indiegogo sharing tools!

You can be the beacon for which others can find their people.

 

 

We are so grateful for your support and look forward to opening Beacon, together!

story:
Welcome to The Yard / The Yardへようこそ

Thanks so much for taking the time to read all about The Yard and our plans to bring this magical space to life in the heart of Kutchan (Eki Mae Dori). 

As many of you know Powder Yoga has been in search of a new home this year, so we went back to the drawing board to re-imagine what our dream space would look like. Deciding not to settle for anything less, we have set out on a new mission to bring this idea to life for our awesome Niseko community. The yard is a space where we can work hard, play hard and rest hard too. Our aim is to bring you all the yoga and fitness that you know love and much much more as well...

The Yard is a recreation space, a multipurpose home designed to enable different ideas and concepts to come to life. We wanted to create a space for Niseko locals that spoke to all the things we hold dear, our health and wellness, our jobs and businesses and our free time. We will open in November 2021 offering yoga + fitness classes provided by Powder yoga, a cold-press juice bar + cafe, a co-working space, a private treatment room for massages, physiotherapy and health coaching consultations, an event and gallery space and last but not least, an indoor skate area with mini ramp and features. 

We want to bring our community together to enjoy everything that The Yard has to offer. No matter your interests this space will have something for you. Healthy food and drinks, skate sessions, yoga, breathwork + fitness classes, community events + workshops, book clubs, language swaps, juice bar cocktail parties, live music, gallery space and so much more. To top it all off we wanted to make sure that our furry friends in Niseko had somewhere to hang out too, so we have a dedicated pet friendly area as part of our co-working space, cafe and juice bar.

We can’t wait to welcome you into our new home.

 

 

We plan to open our doors for Powder Yoga + Fitness's classes by November 15th 2021. After that we are aiming for a phased opening of the other areas of the yard. 

Powder Yoga + Fitness Timetable;

Monday

5:45pm Core with Skye

7:00pm Yoga Flow in Japanese with Ken

Tuesday

5:45pm Power Flow with Skye

7:00pm Yin Yang Flow with Yamile

Wednesday 

5:45pm Circuit TRX with Skye

7:00pm Pilates in Japanese with Leona

Thursday 

5:45pm Vinyasa with Charlie 

Friday 

7:30am Yoga Sculpt with Charlie 

Saturday 

8:30am Aerial Yoga with Charlie 

Sunday 

5:45pm Candlelit Yin Stretch with Charlie

 

倶知安の中心、駅前通りでThe Yardが魔法の空間を生み出します！

多くの人がご存知の通り、今年パウダーヨガは新しい活動の拠点となる場所を探していました。その新しいホーム探しは、私たちの「理想の空間」とはどんなものなのか改めて考え直すきっかけとなりました。そして、私たちはこの素晴らしいニセココミュニティに貢献するため、パウダーヨガが思い描く理想の空間、The Yardを実現する計画を始めたのです。私たちはこの空間が、皆さんが愛するヨガとフィットネス、そしてさらに多くの魅力をもたらし、ニセコの町の人々が存分に働き、遊び、リラックスできるスペースとなる事を目指します。

The Yardは、様々なアイディアやコンセプトを実現できるよう設計された多目的レクリエーションスペースであり、ニセコの町の人々が大切にしている、健康、ビジネス、そして自由な時間を共有できます。2021年11月にオープンし、パウダーヨガが提供するヨガ・フィットネスクラスに加えコールドプレスジュースバー・カフェ、共有ワークスペース、プライベートマッサージルーム、理学療法と健康指導のコンサルティングスペース、イベント・ギャラリースペース、またミニランプやその他魅力的な機能を備えた屋内スケートエリアが設営される予定です。

私たちは、町のコミュニティが集まりThe Yardが提供するサービスを存分に楽しんでもらえる場をつくる事を目標にしています。ヘルシーな食事・ドリンク、アイススケート、ヨガ、呼吸法・フィットネスクラス、コミュニティイベント・ワークショップ、読書クラブ、言語交流、ジュースバー・カクテルパーティー、ライブミュージック、ギャラリースペースなど、The Yardはどんな方にも楽しんで頂けるサービスを提供します。また、動物を愛するニセコの皆さんのために、共有ワーキングスペースとジュースバー・カフェの一角にペットフレンドリーエリアを設置します。

町の新しい憩いの場、The Yardを皆さんに見せするのが待ちきれません！

2021年11月1日までにパウダーヨガによるヨガ・フィットネスクラスをオープンし、それに続き他エリアも段階的にオープンする予定です。11月中旬までにジュースバー・カフェ、11月末までにスケートエリアの完成を予定しています。

What We Need & What You Get /私たちが必要な支援とそのお返し

To get up and running we are inviting you to be a part of our launch. We would never ask for anything for free, so all of our crowdfunding perks translate into real life products and services for you to enjoy once we are open. For your peace of mind, if we can’t deliver on a service once open you will receive a full refund for anything contributed to the campaign.

We are looking to raise 1,000,000 yen to help purchase start up equipment such as juicers and coffee machines and get the renovation completed for every area of our plan. At the moment we are working with a blank canvas space, so there is a lot of work to be done. If you’d like to be a part of this with us, you can see the details of all our campaign perks below, choose the perk that works for you and help us build The Yard together. To view the full details of the perk you can click to see the description of what is included. 

Your contributions will enable us to bring this awesome space to life. It’s been a rough few seasons for Niseko locals, and many of us are still struggling with keeping our businesses a float. Finding a way to work together as a community to help us to grow and succeed collectively is one of our founding principles. If your business would like to be involved with us at The Yard, we would love to hear from you to discuss partnership opportunities. We are open to partnership opportunities from local food and drinks providers, bakers, artists, treatment providers and products creators so please get in touch and let's start something awesome together.    

私たちはクラウドファンディングを開設し、現在、この夢ある計画の実現に協力してくれる方々を募集しています。このクラウドファンディングのキャンペーンに協力して頂いた方々には、The Yardが完成した際に、私たちの感謝の気持ちを込めた商品やサービスでお返しさせて頂きます。万が一、お返しの手段としてサービスが適用されない場合、The Yardオープン後に御寄付額全額返金させて頂きます。

ジューサーやコーヒーメーカーなどのオープンに際して必要な機器の購入や、リノベーションに必要な資金100万円をクラウドファンディングで達成することを目指しています。以下にあるキャンペーン特典の詳細をチェックし、自分にピッタリの特典を選択して、私たちと一緒にThe Yardを完成させましょう！特典の内容は以下をクリック！

コロナの影響により、ここ数年はニセコの人々にとって不安定な時期となり、私たちの多くは未だビジネスを元の状態に戻すのに苦労している状況です。私たちのこのキャンペーンの目的の一つは、町の人々が一つのコミュニティとして協力し、共に成長する事です。The Yardとのパートナーシップに興味があるビジネスオーナーの方は、ぜひお問い合わせください。The Yardは、ローカルの飲食店、パン屋、アーティスト、プロダクトクリエイターなどあらゆるビジネスとのパートナーシップの機会を積極的に受け入れています。ぜひ私たちと一緒に素晴らしいものを創り上げましょう！

Other Ways You Can Help / あなたにできる他の支援

We know that being able to contribute financially won’t be possible for everyone, so if you would like to support us in any other way by donating skills or time in exchange for our perks we would love to hear from you. We are looking for people to help with many different areas of the project so please send us an email to get involved... hello@theyardniseko.com 

If you are busy keeping yourself a-float right now then even just sharing our message on social media and helping to spread the campaign word would be an amazing help. 

Thanks to everyone for your continued support in making this project a reality, we can't wait to open our doors to you soon.  

経済的な支援は誰にでもできることではない事を私たちは十分理解しています。The Yardを他の面でサポートしたい！そんな方はぜひ、hello@theyardniseko.comへメールにてお問い合わせください。あなたのスキルや時間が、様々な分野で私たちのプロジェクトを支える大きな力になります。

忙しく、時間に余裕が無い！そんな方は、ソーシャルメディアでこのメッセージをシェアし、私たちのキャンペーンの存在を広めて下さい。一人のシェアが、より大きな支援に繋がります。

このプロジェクトを進めるにあたりご協力いただいた皆さんの支援を、私たちは心から感謝しています。そして、この理想の空間を実現し、皆さんの元に届けられる日を楽しみにしています。
story_txt: Welcome to The Yard / The YardへようこそThanks so much for taking the time to read all about The Yard and our plans to bring this magical space to life in the heart of Kutchan (Eki Mae Dori). As many of you know Powder Yoga has been in search of a new home this year, so we went back to the drawing board to re-imagine what our dream space would look like. Deciding not to settle for anything less, we have set out on a new mission to bring this idea to life for our awesome Niseko community. The yard is a space where we can work hard, play hard and rest hard too. Our aim is to bring you all the yoga and fitness that you know love and much much more as well...The Yard is a recreation space, a multipurpose home designed to enable different ideas and concepts to come to life. story:
OVERVIEW

This project was successfully funded on Kickstarter on the 13th of May.  The kindest 606 souls helped me raise $77,000 for the project of a lifetime. As we are talking about a lifetime, there is tons of work to be done on the property. And you can help me create the most kindest destination in Croatia. You can still book nights in treehouses with promotional prices only on Indiegogo InDemand! Or plant a tree, adopt one from the forest, sponsor a birdhouse or help me build the

 glass greenhouse! Power to the forest!

 

THE DREAM

We are on a mission to build an environmentally and socially conscious retreat with treehouses, like no other. Secluded within the pristine forests of Rastoke, Croatia, Tree Elements greets travelers and shelter-seekers with equal respect.

Creating the kindest treehouse eco-retreat in the world and devoting ourselves to the forest while giving back to the people and to Mother Nature, the retreat will be built with locally sourced materials. Life at Tree Elements is a story of community and conservation of natural and cultural heritage. Help us make our dream come true!

HOW IT ALL STARTED

In 2018 I bought 7 acres/ 28,000m2 of forest land near Rastoke village by Korana river in Croatia. There was nothing on the property except an old house from 1906, a small barn, and one gorgeous linden tree.  The moment I saw the property I knew this was the place where I wanted to create something magical, where I wanted to grow my roots. The proximity of the most beautiful national park in the country - Plitvice Lakes, was just an added bonus. 

I've dreamt of creating a zero-waste, plastic-free, treehouse retreat for a long time. The result is Tree Elements, a labor of love, passion, and dedication. But there’s more: I dream of redefining the concept of travel. Not promoting mass tourism, but proposing an ecological, sustainable, and socially aware way to explore and enjoy travel.

I welcome both travelers and organizations that help those in need.

Now, me and my family are so close to turning the whole property into a zero-waste, zero-plastic retreat and a holistic center called "Tree Elements".
Wooden treehouses named Earth, Water & Wind are all secluded inside the forest, together with the new main house -the gathering place representing the Ether elementand a renovated barn, now a small farmhouse, the Fire element.


WHO ARE YOU?

I am a young girl with an old soul, hanging from a tree, completely in love with them, with nature and life, a huge fighter for justice, for people, and for Mother Earth.

The idea of what I want to do with my life, truly and fully, came to me when I was, luckily, only 28. It was crystal clear: change my career, buy a forest, build treehouses and come up with something new, something kind.

I got my first job in tourism when I was 15 and since then I was saving money like a little squirrel. I have been working and observing the industry for 17 years now, from selling souvenirs, being a cleaning lady, doing PR, working as a waiter, bartender, to working at the hotel's front desks. From working in hostels and managing apartments, to being a guest in numerous places as a tour guide, I knew that this was not the path I was willing to follow because tourism desperately needs improving. I wanted something more, something different and something that could change people’s lives. I wanted to change the way how tourism works and thinks!

That is why I aim to create the kindest eco-retreat in the world, in the middle of Croatia, to devote myself to this forest, to nature, and to the people. All of this with immense help and support from my family and friends. 

RETREAT YOURSELF

Do you want to get away from everything? Yet, be connected to everything? 

In Tree Elements, you can rent a treehouse, or even the whole property and get married in the forest. You can participate in workshops and find inspiration and in yoga, meditation, and healing retreats or make your own retreat. You can come with your team and do a team-building session, shoot a movie, a music video,  or volunteer and educate... And plant trees in your sleep!

There are endless possibilities. As my love for this project is. It has been for years now.

I am not here to promote mass tourism, I am here to propose a new concept of it for which I've coined the term 'eco-kind', meaning, in addition to being ecological and sustainable in the 21st century, we should be also socially aware of the time we live in and be kind to people. 

By staying in our eco-kind retreat, you can help those members of society who might need to heal in this forest the most. You will be promoting environmentally aware travel while being kind to others. 

So we have partnered with organizations that help cancer survivors, abused women, and children with malignant diseases. By inviting them to stay on the property for free and giving them the chance to participate in a variety of workshops and retreats, we want to help them heal from trauma in this magical forest and provide a home away from home. 

We aspire to inspire other business owners to follow the idea. So far, the media houses in Croatia and abroad have recognized the value of the project, for which we are more than grateful and we hope this will have an immense impact on other businesses. 

HOME AMONG THE TREES

The retreat will be open 365 days a year, from August 2021, offering all of you a chance to visit whenever you can. Imagine waking up in a custom-made bed in the middle of the forest, in a treehouse of your choice. Shepherd Nicola is passing by you with his sheep while you are going to the main house for breakfast. If you are not in the mood of leaving your nest, you can have breakfast delivered to you. Now, you might want to go for a walk down to the river for a swim, meditate a bit on a meadow and read a good book you have borrowed from the central library in the main house. 


Then, you would like to cook something yummy so you visit the organic garden, pick your own fruits and veggies and hang out with domestic animals. Later on, you might want to participate in yoga, meditation & healing programs, maybe attend a workshop, go on a hike, visit the National Park Plitvice Lakes or get a bike and enjoy numerous activities in the region.  Or you rented the whole property and got married! CONGRATULATIONS!

All of it while helping others with your stay and planting trees in your sleep! 



WHAT WE NEED AND WHAT YOU GET?

We need to build a village! A village of treehouses! And you get to be among the first ones to visit. Or anytime in the future, for that manner. Just come and visit us! Or you can get something for our Mother Nature, by planting a tree, sponsoring a birdhouse, or simply he

TREEHOUSES EARTH, WATER & WIND

Imagine a place where you can rent more than a treehouse. Where you get a lifestyle while giving back. 

When promising peace & quiet, it is important to deliver precisely that. That’s why there are only 3 treehouses for you to rent: Earth, Water & Wind, representing the elements of Nature. 

You will be high in the air since all of them are almost 3 m (9 feet) above the ground, while the highest point is set on 9 m (18  feet). All of them will be built with wood and glass all coming from Croatian producers. The exterior is the same, while the interiors change according to the element they represent, so each one has a story to tell through interesting details and colors.

All of them have been designed to take advantage of passive cooling and heating with heat pumps, thus reducing the need for air-conditioning. "Push" valves, water-saving showerheads, and low flush toilet systems will be installed to preserve water while rainwater will be collected for watering the garden, flushing toilets, washing the clothes, and general household cleaning.

The size of each treehouse is 25 m2 (260ft2), all containing living space, a fully equipped kitchen, and a bathroom on one floor, while the gallery (13m2/139ft2) features a king-size bed. It can fit 4 people (with a custom-made pullout sofa). The living room opens out to a lovely wooden terrace through beautiful glass doors. Under each treehouse, we will have a decorated space for you to relax on hammocks, while the communal space will be in the main house and in front of it, under this big linden tree.

FIRE ELEMENT - the small farmhouse

This will be my home for the beginning. It was supposed to be a wood workshop but since we lack funds to furnish the main house, and since I need to supervise the construction until August, I need to be there. I want to start working on the farm as soon as possible, once this little guy is built. So we have decided to renovate the old barn into a small farmhouse that will also serve as accommodation in near future for different retreats and occasions.

The wood workshop will come, hopefully, with your help. Some funds we raise here can create a place where we would educate people about the importance of wood and natural materials. We want it to be an inspirational space and a place where, with local wood makers, we can create magic for the forest and more.
 

ETHER ELEMENT - the main house and the gathering place

The five elements theory existed in many ancient cultures such as Greek, Japanese, Traditional Chinese Medicine, and more. The fifth element on top of the earth, air, fire, and water, is space or aether. The Ether element is the space in which everything happens. 

So is this house, a place in which it all happens. Place of gatherings, of the people - all of you who visit or help in any way and leave a part of yourself here.  Here, you will attend workshops and numerous programs and meet me, my family, other travelers, or simply enjoy a home-cooked meal... You may also rent the house and the whole property, having the forest just for yourself.

It will hold a central library under the wooden stairs filled with local green guides, inspirational and motivational books, books about nature, food, novels… 


HOW WILL THE FUNDS BE USED AND WHAT HAVE WE DONE SO FAR?

Starting from scratch, without any infrastructure... it is expensive, to say the least. I've spent all of my personal savings (including my parents and my sister's).  From 2018, the money went for land,  road, water and electricity, rainwatertanks, bio sewage tanks, heat pumps for heating and cooling, organic garden, construction of the small farmhouse, foundations for everything, steel construction, architects, paperwork, and a deposit for the construction of the treehouses with the main house (20%). The rest 80% is covered with the loan from the bank, but not enough to finish all of this. They started to build the first prefabricated house in May, 2021.

I was ready to take the leap already in 2020 and then She showed up. Corona came, I lost my job as a tour guide, lost my income and a possibility to get an investment loan which completely changed my plans... This is when my parents and my sister got financially involved with loaning the money for foundations, steel construction, and bio sewage tanks.Without their help, I would be deep down. Deeper than Adele, believe me.  Now, all eyes are on me to finish this battle. By backing this project I will have the funds for the interior decoration and a bit of exterior.
 

 Due to the unfortunate situation in the tourism industry caused by the spread of Coronavirus the banks were not investing in tourism-related projects.

If Corona did not happen, I would easily get the investment loan with the amount needed things would be much different. So after 10 different banks refused my application for the investment and 16 months of battle against windmills, I was finally able to get a loan to cover all the construction, but not enough amount.  So what now?

You need to sleep in a bed, right? You need a nice kitchen to cook some lovely fresh meals? Do you need a sofa to sit and watch outside? Sure thing you do.


YOU are the key

YOU can help me finish make my dream come true by Aug 2021. $35,000 would go directly into the interior of the treehouses. Things like kitchens, beds, bathroom equipment and so on would be funded from your support, so they are ready for your visit.

Other rewards would be for the exterior. Not only for this property (wood workshop, pathways) but for Her.  Mother Nature.  After all, it is Her property.

Think homes for the birds while planting more and more trees, a rich organic forest garden, and then magic! Wooden benches with inspirational thoughts, art sculptures made by local designers, and a glasshouse with herbs and spices...

Here's the breakdown;

$30,000 - interior works for three guest treehouses 

$15,000 - interior works for the main house

$30,000 - exterior and landscaping

 

More funds received would go into the landscaping, plus things such as a pathway to the river, a decent chicken coop, a yoga amphitheater, irrigation system, wooden deck for the main house, more domestic animals, a tool shed, glass greenhouse,  little spots around the forest to unwind and so many unexpected expenses.

 


HELP ME GET OFF MY TREE AND CHOSE YOUR REWARD,PRETTY PLEASE 

(these are just some of many, every sponsorship gets a certificate and loyalty card)

$15 loyalty card with forever discounts. Comes with every perk.

$40 name a tree


 

$50 plant a tree



$70 adopt a birdhouse

$1500 sponsor a giant wooden swing

$3,500 sponsor a glass greenhouse


THE IMPACT

We want for a traveler to develop a growing sense of one another, our world, and our place in it. Yes, there should be a connection between the traveler and the local community with the environment but the purchase of something should have an impact locally & directly as well as morally. Why not supporting eco-kind businesses and change the tourism industry?

A retreat where all the furniture comes from local designers, all the products are bought from little producers who are making a difference, where food comes from the organic garden or neighboring farms and your stay supports planting trees around Croatia!

PLANT TREES IN YOUR SLEEP

We are proud to have partners as "Zasadi stablo, ne budi panj"("Plant a tree, don't be a stump"), an environmental non-profit association responsible for the (r)evolution of collective planting in Croatia. It started from one week of planting trees last year to the whole month of March of this year. With the help of 55,000 volunteers, they have planted more than 150,000 trees. And that number is growing.

We want to be part of that number, on a large scale. This is our way to give back to Mother Nature. In these times when She needs it the most.

With the help of our partners, we will plant trees provided by Tree Elements. How? Simple.

Each stay = 1 tree planted.  A little forest revolution.

Ok, not so simple. Since we are doing something nobody has done before. At least not in this country. Your pledge for planting trees will help plant and grow the first Miyawaki forest in Croatia!! It is a technique pioneered by Japanese botanist Akira Miyawaki, that helps build dense, native forests and ensures plant growth 10 times faster and 30 times denserthan usual. It involves planting native species in the same area and becomes maintenance-free after the first three years. 

By staying with us you can show what a responsible and sustainable travel destination is, away from the masses, while being ecologically and socially aware of the time we live in. The essence should be the interaction, not only a transaction.

Make forests, not war! 


 

ECO - KIND TOURISM 

The idea of - tourism for all - is reflected in giving the treehouses for free, to users of different organizations around the country who help abused women, children, and cancer patients... In the 21 century, the emphasis is on the environment and sustainability but what if it could include social input as well? Being kind to one another? So we have decided to partner with organizations "Sve za nju" and "Krijesnica" and their users will, from time to time, come to stay for free and participate in different retreats.

Why not invite people to put some light back into their lives? Well, here, they are invited to stay between the trees, to find the motivation, and to find inspiration by participating in healing programs. Maybe by healing the mind, the body can be healed as well. 

“Place your hands into soil to feel grounded. Wade in water to feel emotionally healed. Fill your lungs with fresh air to feel mentally clear. Raise your face to the heat of the sun and connect with that fire to feel your own immense power”

We will show what a responsible tourist destination means in an overcrowded and overwhelmed tourist country such as Croatia and focus on the continental part of the country. "Mass tourism shows a loss of the authenticity & quality of the destination while doing it merely for-profit and stripping it of its essence until it’s no longer recognizable."

Environmentally conscious travel does not mean compromising on comfort, nor socially aware travel should. It can only bring more value to the money. The desire to give something back to the places we visit is wholesome and ought to be encouraged.

That's why your stay with us means much more. It changes people's lives.

...GREEN IS THE NEW BLACK

Heat pumps will be installed for every treehouse and the main house. These pumps use air as a source of energy, they transform the outside air for heating or cooling of the indoor spaces. The pumps will also double as water heaters.

Bio septic sewage system will be installed, providing eco-friendly wastewater treatment. 

Rainwater harvesting will be done through the roof of a house and a small farmhouse. Environmental friendly materials will be used while building. We talk about bio-architecture: all walls (including roof and floor) are insulated with rigid insulating panels that contribute to optimizing the thermal performance and consumption of the house.

Everything from bed linen to the food will be organic and fair trade. Tables, chairs, bed frames will be built from local or recycled materials and by local designers. The material from the salvaged house and the barn will be incorporated into the building.

All bathrooms will have water-saving shower systems, environmentally-friendly paper (from copier paper, toilet paper, paper towels), organic towels, and low-water toilets in order to use significantly less water. Composting material will be used for the garden while recycling bins will be placed throughout the property.

An organic garden will be planted from which all the food will be coming from, including neighboring farms as well.

LOCATION & ACTIVITIES

In the heart of Croatia, in Karlovac county, surrounded by the gorgeous river Korana, close to 3 more rivers and 3 national parks. The proximity (40mins) of Plitvice Lakes National Park is something that should be cherished and I am forever grateful to find this amazing location where all of you will be able to relax, connect with the Earth, give yourself a break, and find that peace the forest is filled with.

  • The retreat is a 1.30hrs drive from the capital, Zagreb, the biggest airport in the country (100km-60miles)
  •  Rastoke waterfall village – 10mins drive from the property, the introduction to the NP Plitvice lakes, where waterfalls are a common sight in people's backyards.
  • Border with Bosnia & Hercegovina is 35 mins away, where one can find the best rafting center in the region; whitewater rafting & canoeing on Una river
  • Adriatic coast (the northern part with Istria region and Dalmatian coast with Zadar) is to be found a bit over 2hrs drive from the property (160km/100miles)
  •  Gorski Kotar, the region perfect for skiing & hiking, the green lungs of Croatia or the Croatian Switzerland, is just 2 hrs away, with NP Risnjak 
  •  NP Velebit on 1:45mins of drive can pleasantly surprise travelers with hiking options and with Kuterevo - home to the first Bear Orphanage in Croatia, providing shelter to young, abandoned bears.

In addition, there is a world of possibilities to do:

  • hiking, trekking, horseback riding, cycling (11okm/70miles of trails)
  • visiting 4 different rivers, lakes, underground caves, the largest underground airport and military base of ex Yugoslavia
  • kayaking, canoeing, swimming, fishing, rafting
  • photo safari (brown bears, lynxes, wolves, foxes, deer, rabbits, wild boars, quails, pheasants, etc.)
  • Nordic walking (18 trails in Karlovac county)
  • paintball, archery, zipline, quad adventure, adrenalin park

 

RISK & CHALLENGES

The biggest risk is finishing the project by August 2021. This year has taught the whole world not to plan much, but I have been waiting for this to happen for so long and all I have left now is time and hope. You being the hope. The covid virus can ruin the plan as well, but this type of accommodation and service will work perfectly in the upcoming years. Even if we don’t do this on time, the retreat will be open.

Delivering rewards: some rewards will be delivered in 2 phases, such as planting trees. The first part is the certificate and loyalty card that will come as soon as possible in digital shape to the backer email address. The exact planting of trees will be in autumn as that is the best time to do so. That being said, the other part of the rewards, such as the photo of the tree or the birdhouse for ex. will be delivered later, again in digital shape so we avoid impact on the environment. Other rewards such as accommodation in treehouses will be possible from the moment we open the retreat, starting August or September. The backers will be welcome to come and use their rewards and see some on the property. We just need to build it. "Build it and they will come. "

Other Ways You Can Help

We need you. This forest needs you. The world needs you. 

Join the campaign, help in any way, share it, and promote us on:

 FACEBOOK     https://www.facebook.com/treelements

INSTAGRAM    https://www.instagram.com/tree.elements/

And last but not least...

THANK YOU.   For believing in the kindest eco-retreat in the world.

Power to the forest. And the people.
story_txt:
OVERVIEW
This project was successfully funded on Kickstarter on the 13th of May.  The kindest 606 souls helped me raise $77,000 for the project of a lifetime. As we are talking about a lifetime, there is tons of work to be done on the property. And you can help me create the most kindest destination in Croatia. You can still book nights in treehouses with promotional prices only on Indiegogo InDemand! Or plant a tree, adopt one from the forest, sponsor a birdhouse or help me build the
 glass greenhouse! Power to the forest!
 
THE DREAM
We are on a mission to build an environmentally and socially conscious retreat with treehouses, like no other. Secluded within the pristine forests of Rastoke, Croatia, Tree Elements greets travelers and shelter-seekers with equal respect.
Creating the kindest treehouse eco-retreat in the world and devoting ourselves to the forest while giving back to the people and to Mother Nature, the retreat will be built with locally sourced materials. Life at Tree Elements is a story of community and conservation of natural and cultural heritage. Help us make our dream come true!

HOW IT ALL STARTED
In 2018 I bought 7 acres/ 28,000m2 of forest land near Rastoke village by Korana river in Croatia. There was nothing on the property except an old house from 1906, a small barn, and one gorgeous linden tree.  The moment I saw the property I knew this was the place where I wanted to create something magical, where I wanted to grow my roots. The proximity of the most beautiful national park in the country - Plitvice Lakes, was just an added bonus. 
I've dreamt of creating a zero-waste, plastic-free, treehouse retreat for a long time. The result is Tree Elements, a labor of love, passion, and dedication. But there’s more: I dream of redefining the concept of travel. Not promoting mass tourism, but proposing an ecological, sustainable, and socially aware way to explore and enjoy travel.

I welcome both travelers and organizations that help those in need.
Now, me and my family are so close to turning the whole property into a zero-waste, zero-plastic retreat and a holistic center called "Tree Elements".Wooden treehouses named Earth, Water & Wind are all secluded inside the forest, together with the new main house -the gathering place representing the Ether elementand a renovated barn, now a small farmhouse, the Fire element.


WHO ARE YOU?

I am a young girl with an old soul, hanging from a tree, completely in love with them, with nature and life, a huge fighter for justice, for people, and for Mother Earth.
The idea of what I want to do with my life, truly and fully, came to me when I was, luckily, only 28. It was crystal clear: change my career, buy a forest, build treehouses and come up with something new, something kind.

I got my first job in tourism when I was 15 and since then I was saving money like a little squirrel. I have been working and observing the industry for 17 years now, from selling souvenirs, being a cleaning lady, doing PR, working as a waiter, bartender, to working at the hotel's front desks. From working in hostels and managing apartments, to being a guest in numerous places as a tour guide, I knew that this was not the path I was willing to follow because tourism desperately needs improving. I wanted something more, something different and something that could change people’s lives. I wanted to change the way how tourism works and thinks!
That is why I aim to create the kindest eco-retreat in the world, in the middle of Croatia, to devote myself to this forest, to nature, and to the people. All of this with immense help and support from my family and friends. 
RETREAT YOURSELF

Do you want to get away from everything? Yet, be connected to everything? 
In Tree Elements, you can rent a treehouse, or even the whole property and get married in the forest. You can participate in workshops and find inspiration and in yoga, meditation, and healing retreats or make your own retreat. You can come with your team and do a team-building session, shoot a movie, a music video,  or volunteer and educate... And plant trees in your sleep!
There are endless possibilities. As my love for this project is. It has been for years now.
I am not here to promote mass tourism, I am here to propose a new concept of it for which I've coined the term 'eco-kind', meaning, in addition to being ecological and sustainable in the 21st century, we should be also socially aware of the time we live in and be kind to people. 
By staying in our eco-kind retreat, you can help those members of society who might need to heal in this forest the most. You will be promoting environmentally aware travel while being kind to others. 
So we have partnered with organizations that help cancer survivors, abused women, and children with malignant diseases. By inviting them to stay on the property for free and giving them the chance to participate in a variety of workshops and retreats, we want to help them heal from trauma in this magical forest and provide a home away from home. 
We aspire to inspire other business owners to follow the idea. So far, the media houses in Croatia and abroad have recognized the value of the project, for which we are more than grateful and we hope this will have an immense impact on other businesses. 

HOME AMONG THE TREES
The retreat will be open 365 days a year, from August 2021, offering all of you a chance to visit whenever you can. Imagine waking up in a custom-made bed in the middle of the forest, in a treehouse of your choice. Shepherd Nicola is passing by you with his sheep while you are going to the main house for breakfast. If you are not in the mood of leaving your nest, you can have breakfast delivered to you. Now, you might want to go for a walk down to the river for a swim, meditate a bit on a meadow and read a good book you have borrowed from the central library in the main house. 

Then, you would like to cook something yummy so you visit the organic garden, pick your own fruits and veggies and hang out with domestic animals. Later on, you might want to participate in yoga, meditation & healing programs, maybe attend a workshop, go on a hike, visit the National Park Plitvice Lakes or get a bike and enjoy numerous activities in the region.  Or you rented the whole property and got married! CONGRATULATIONS!
All of it while helping others with your stay and planting trees in your sleep! 


WHAT WE NEED AND WHAT YOU GET?
We need to build a village! A village of treehouses! And you get to be among the first ones to visit. Or anytime in the future, for that manner. Just come and visit us! Or you can get something for our Mother Nature, by planting a tree, sponsoring a birdhouse, or simply he
TREEHOUSES EARTH, WATER & WIND

Imagine a place where you can rent more than a treehouse. Where you get a lifestyle while giving back. 
When promising peace & quiet, it is important to deliver precisely that. That’s why there are only 3 treehouses for you to rent: Earth, Water & Wind, representing the elements of Nature. 
You will be high in the air since all of them are almost 3 m (9 feet) above the ground, while the highest point is set on 9 m (18  feet). All of them will be built with wood and glass all coming from Croatian producers. The exterior is the same, while the interiors change according to the element they represent, so each one has a story to tell through interesting details and colors.
All of them have been designed to take advantage of passive cooling and heating with heat pumps, thus reducing the need for air-conditioning. "Push" valves, water-saving showerheads, and low flush toilet systems will be installed to preserve water while rainwater will be collected for watering the garden, flushing toilets, washing the clothes, and general household cleaning.

The size of each treehouse is 25 m2 (260ft2), all containing living space, a fully equipped kitchen, and a bathroom on one floor, while the gallery (13m2/139ft2) features a king-size bed. It can fit 4 people (with a custom-made pullout sofa). The living room opens out to a lovely wooden terrace through beautiful glass doors. Under each treehouse, we will have a decorated space for you to relax on hammocks, while the communal space will be in the main house and in front of it, under this big linden tree.

FIRE ELEMENT - the small farmhouse
This will be my home for the beginning. It was supposed to be a wood workshop but since we lack funds to furnish the main house, and since I need to supervise the construction until August, I need to be there. I want to start working on the farm as soon as possible, once this little guy is built. So we have decided to renovate the old barn into a small farmhouse that will also serve as accommodation in near future for different retreats and occasions.


The wood workshop will come, hopefully, with your help. Some funds we raise here can create a place where we would educate people about the importance of wood and natural materials. We want it to be an inspirational space and a place where, with local wood makers, we can create magic for the forest and more.
